title: .earth | a faster way to explore web3
body:
The current experience for users of web3 systems relies on a complex knowledge of the cryptocurrency ecosystem. .earth intends to simplify the user experience.

### the problem: on-chain data is complex

Early adopters of decentralized networks were required to have a layered understanding of blockchain mechanics, language, networks, and applications. While everyone is doing cool things like sending and receiving tokenized assets, participating in the governance of their favorite organizations, and staking assets to earn rewards, most of these actions are difficult to see at once, and require using multiple dapps.

![WEB3 NAVIGATION IS FRAGMENTED](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/c0hP1XQ-uwYf-Pvo0Pq4g.png?height=912&width=1884)

A majority of the experience involves reading granular information to inspect transaction details, verify contracts, or track wallet activity, while being overwhelmed by a multitude of different data variables being presented.

![ON-CHAIN DATA IS COMPLEX](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XuN_Y_2JLquXH0COm1rSs.png?height=614&width=1672)

Understanding what has happened on-chain is not only difficult but also time-consuming, for even the most experienced users. This is our biggest barrier to driving mass adoption and expanding utility for future users. As the web3 ecosystem grows we need to re-think how we communicate and interpret block interactions to onboard new users and achieve greater scale. It’s all about learning with each other in web3, and we’re making that easier.

## our mission: changing the game of block exploration

.earth is changing the game of block exploration. We’re in the business of translating complex transactions on cryptocurrency networks, so you can easily show off and find all the cool stuff that happens on chain.

Instead of looking up a transaction for a 50/50 FTX/ETH LP pair on Uniswap using Etherscan…

![ETHERSCAN SCREENSHOT OF UNISWAP LP ADD](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oGP2gJugh0-y2RNvaZPy-.png?height=543&width=886)

Imagine being presented this image of an LP pool.

![.EARTH GLYPH OF UNISWAP LP POOL ADD](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/x1UuZ1a2MUxNpDPNjnXsZ.png?height=381&width=459)

## we’re creating a beautiful visual language that simplifies TXN information

.earth is focused on delivering an experience driven by an easy to understand visual language that is built for mass adoption. We’re **literally building the language of web3, with high fidelity glyphs** of everyday on-chain interactions. Working with the finest graphic and visual designers, data scientists and smart contract developers, we’re bringing you the beautiful, seamless web3 experience we all deserve. Our visual language will set the stage for global recognition of everything web3. Our graphic symbology will quite literally represent the blockchain.

## what we do

Someone just bought an Ape Punk and joined the CryptoPunks community. Check out who they are and what they’ve been doing on Mainnet last week with just a few clicks. Who you are in web3 is first and foremost about what you do on-chain. We make it easy for you to look up users, trends, tokens, events and other activities, so you spend **far less time** being **much more** informed.

![WHAT WE DO](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/wdZ04q_u6gOoA9QdEDigU.png?height=628&width=1812)

Our .earth maps aim to define, capture and share moments and personas as they are happening in real-time. Use our maps to create stories and gather valuable insights on most recent user activity, group behaviors, key trends and major events all within the same visual language.

![HOW IT WORKS](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/TMP-THlBxfPRcBenB2hio.png?height=906&width=1898)

Participate in the next iteration of web3 exploration. We’re going visual and viral. Come discover web3 and tell your story with .earth.

title: 100 Ways to Play with Guardian Address（Guardian地址的一百种玩法）
body:
**Guardian地址的一百种玩法**

**100 Ways to Play with Guardian Address**

Guardian地址具有非常大的灵活性，以下提出一些用途，有些可能不那么严肃，仅供好玩和激发大家思考。如果你有什么有价值或有意思的应用场景推荐，请联系5660.eth。

The Guardian address is very flexible, some uses are suggested below, some may be less serious, just for fun and to stimulate everyone's thinking. If you have any valuable or interesting application scenarios to recommend, please contact 5660.eth.

1，NFT防盗

NFT anti-theft

2，NFT租赁

NFT Leasing

3，公司场景。比如身份证明类NFT，在Web3治理中，“CEO 身份证明NFT”归CEO使用，但转移权归董事会。持有“CEO身份证明NFT”的人，在Web3治理中，可以行使CEO权力，但选择谁做CEO，其权力归董事会。其他员工权限分配和管理同样的道理。

Company scene. For example, the identity proof NFT, in Web3 governance, the "CEO identity proof NFT" is used by the CEO, but the transfer right belongs to the board of directors. The person who holds the "CEO identity certificate NFT" can exercise the power of the CEO in Web3 governance, but whoever chooses to be the CEO, its power belongs to the board of directors. The same is true for other employee rights assignment and management.

身份证明NFT的作用：以Web3公司为例，目前来看，Web3公司大部分可能会采取去中心化办公形式，或者更加灵活的招聘和任用形式。身份证明NFT则可以表明某人在公司中的身份，同时也匹配一定的权限，同时也从公司领取一定的薪水。QS-2将NFT的使用权和转移权分离，为身份证明NFT的使用打通了瓶颈。

The role of identity proof NFT: Take Web3 companies as an example. At present, most of Web3 companies may adopt a decentralized office form, or a more flexible form of recruitment and appointment. The identity certificate NFT can indicate the identity of a person in the company, and also match certain permissions, and also receive a certain salary from the company. QS-2 separates the use rights and transfer rights of NFTs, which has opened up a bottleneck for the use of identity proof NFTs.

4，区分婚前NFT财产和婚后NFT财产。Guardian地址的全部私钥仅为一方掌握的，就是婚前NFT财产；双方各自掌握一部分Guardian地址的私钥的，即为婚后NFT财产。爱她，就把Guardian地址的全部私钥私钥交给她！

Distinguish between pre-marital NFT property and post-marital NFT property. The entire private key of the Guardian address is only owned by one party, which is the NFT property before marriage; the private key of the Guardian address is owned by both parties, which is the NFT property after the marriage. If you love her, give her all the private keys and private keys of the Guardian address!

5，钻石手。对NFT的Guardian地址设置期限，并把Guardian地址设置为特殊地址，那么在此时间段内，没有人能够转移此NFT，强行钻石管住手（或者改进QS-2，可以只设置时间，而不设置地址，在此时间内，无人能够转移该NFT）。

Diamond hands. Set a deadline for the NFT's Guardian address, and set the Guardian address as a special address, then during this time period, no one can transfer this NFT (or improve QS-2, you can only set the time, not Set the address, during this time, no one will be able to transfer the NFT)

6，集资买入高价值NFT。

Raise funds to buy high-value NFTs.

7，项目方或大户在合约之外，额外承诺锁仓时间。

The project party or large households promise additional lock-up time outside of the smart contract.

8，灵魂绑定代币。QS-3是解决所谓的SBTs的行之有效的方法。

Soulbound Tokens. QS-3 is a proven solution to the so-called SBTs.

V神参与的Soulbound论文：寻找web3的灵魂

English Vision：<https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=4105763>

中文翻译：<https://www.panewslab.com/zh/articledetails/1652665746121864.html>

9，教育。例如你申请并获得了一个学位。学校Guardian将你的学位NFT发放至你的对应钱包地址，你只有使用权，没有交易权。当你的私钥丢失时，你可以通过申请，学校可以通过合约，将你的学位NFT转移到你的新地址，你就重新获得了学位NFT。如果你在毕业后，被查出学术不端，学校也可以收回你的学位NFT。

Education. For example you applied for and received a degree. The school Guardian will distribute your degree NFT to your corresponding wallet address. You only have the right to use it, but not the right to trade. When your private key is lost, you can apply, and the school can transfer your degree NFT to your new address through a contract, and you have regained your degree NFT. If you are found to have academic misconduct after graduation, the school can also withdraw your degree NFT.

10，行政。例如你的孩子出生后，国家身份认证机关Guardian给他发放身份NFT，凭此他可享受一切公民应该享受的福利，比如补贴、救济金、养老金等。也可将此身份NFT与个人其他数据绑定，需要注意的是，为了保护个人隐私，其他数据可以放在链下，或者采用隐私计算等形式存放。

Administration. For example, after your child is born, the national identity authentication agency Guardian will issue him an identity NFT, with which he can enjoy all the benefits that citizens should enjoy, such as subsidies, relief funds, pensions, etc. This identity NFT can also be bound to other personal data. It should be noted that in order to protect personal privacy, other data can be placed off-chain or stored in the form of privacy computing.

11\.NFT抵押借贷的新模型。当NFT拥有者需要抵押借贷时，只需将Guardian地址改为NFT抵押借贷的智能合约地址，此时持有者获得借贷资金，NFT仍保留在NFT持有者钱包（NFT持有者仍然可以享受NFT的使用权），但持有者无法转移NFT。当NFT持有者偿还贷款后，NFT抵押借贷智能合约取消自己的Guardian身份，NFT持有者重新获得NFT转移权。若NFT持有者无法偿还贷款，则智能合约将NFT从持有者钱包转移。这种模型更符合现实中的一些惯例，比如房产抵押借贷。

A new model for NFT mortgage lending. When the NFT owner needs to mortgage loan, he only needs to change the Guardian address to the smart contract address for NFT mortgage loan. At this time, the holder obtains the loan funds, and the NFT remains in the NFT holder's wallet (NFT holders can still enjoy the right to use the NFT), but the holder cannot transfer the NFT. When the NFT holder repays the loan, the NFT mortgage loan smart contract cancels its Guardian status, and the NFT holder regains the NFT transfer right. If the NFT holder cannot repay the loan, the smart contract transfers the NFT from the holder's wallet. This model is more in line with some real-world conventions, such as real estate mortgage lending.

12，聚会邀请函和俱乐部会员资格的分发与回收。

Distribution and recycling of party invitations and club memberships.

13，分期付款。当完成第一笔付款时，商家（Guardian）即可将NFT转入买家（Ward）地址，买家可以使用，但无法转移。当买家完成全部付款后，Guardian取消自己的Guardian身份，买家即具有对NFT完全的所有权。为了保护买家的权益，这一切流程可以通过智能合约执行。

Installment. When the first payment is completed, the merchant (Guardian) can transfer the NFT to the buyer (Ward) address, which the buyer can use, but cannot transfer the NFT. When the buyer completes the full payment, the Guardian removes his Guardian status, and the buyer has full ownership of the NFT.In order to protect the interests of buyers from harm, all these processes can be executed through smart contracts.

14，NFT试用。当潜在买家表露出对某个NFT的购买意愿时，卖家（Guardian）可以将NFT转入买家(Ward）地址让买家试用该NFT。当买家付款后，卖家取消自己的Guardian身份，买家即具有对NFT完全的所有权。

NFT trial. When potential buyers express their willingness to purchase an NFT, the seller(Guardian) can transfer the NFT to the buyer's address(Ward) for the buyer to try the NFT. When the buyer pays, the seller removes his Guardian status, and the buyer has full ownership of the NFT.

title: ICP五小时会议小结（20220713）
body:
**ICP作为2021年上线后从500刀一路下跌到5刀，是这一波最大的天王级项目，7月13号在推特上听了五个小时，做小结如下：**

### 利多

1，项目方资金实力依然雄厚，在ICP发币前融资金额已经足够目前200多人的团队五年以上的开发，ICP发币后又抢在第一抛币囤了大量现金；

2，项目方在区块链共识算法等方面有技术上的创新和突破；

3，愿景宏大，要做去中心化的云计算平台。

### 利空

1，项目方比较自私，早早抛币砸盘，早期私募成本0.037美金而且拿走大量份额，解锁玩还需要三年时间；

2，项目推广运营能力弱，币圈大部分人都不知道ICP到底是干啥的，到底在干些啥；

3，目前只有13个节点，新加入的节点需要提案通过才行，治理上过于中心化，利益上大概率自己内部消化挖矿带来的所有收益，技术上更像一个发了币的联盟链；

4，每个节点性能要求极高，内存要求300G起，一旦开发节点让普通性能的服务器加入，链的性能一定大幅下降，后续考虑开放更多普通性能大边沿节点，可以预期的是割一波韭菜的同时链的性能也会大幅下降。

### 结论

正如特斯拉所说，ICP这么吹上天的项目结果能100倍的跌，一定有很多我们不知道的内幕，即使熊市抄底也要慎重选择ICP。

title: Inside jokes
body:
Photo by [Priscilla Du Preez](https://unsplash.com/@priscilladupreez?utm_source=unsplash&utm_medium=referral&utm_content=creditCopyText) on [Unsplash](https://unsplash.com/s/photos/joke?utm_source=unsplash&utm_medium=referral&utm_content=creditCopyText)

## For someone's eyes only

There are many parts to becoming a web3 ninja. One of those building blocks is understanding public key cryptography. Now, I will be the first to admit that I am far from an expert on cryptography, or even the narrow subset of it called public key cryptography. If you want a deep dive on that, you won't find it here. That said, it helps to understand at least a little about it in order to understand the basics of blockchain and how decentralized systems work. Since a decentralized system doesn't have a centralized actor that everybody trusts to keep accounts safe, to tell the truth and ensure that others are telling the truth, whatever, web3 replaces that with strong cryptographic proofs that ensure that things are what they say they are. Public key cryptography is part of that in that it allows anybody to take a public key, which is just a long string of alphanumeric characters that happen to posess the magical, mathematical power to prove that one specific private key, another, longer string of alphanumeric characters, used some more mathematical magic to "sign" something. Furthermore, not only can anyone use a given public key to verify that the corresponding private key signed a given transaction, they can also encrypt any data or message with the public key so that only the holder of the the corresponding private key can decrypt and read the message/data. So, yay, now I've got a very cursory understanding of public key cryptography. So what?

## Inside jokes

So who cares about all this stuff? Setting aside PGP, TLS, and all of the modern Web 2.0 world that we live in that relies on public key cryptography to trust that people on the Internet are who say they say they are and that it really is only you and me and whoever else is on our Whatsapp group who can read these messages (until recently anyway), you and I can build some pretty neat things with public key cryptography, like the ability to send inside jokes to each other that only live as long as we keep a browser window open and that hopefully nobody apart from us can trace or even know who sent it to who. Never say never as there are no guarantees in life, but thanks to Web3, I believe I've managed to build a reasonably untraceable, encrypted chat app that isn't far removed from burner phones in how it works. And, it has reasonably funny robot faces.

## How it works

[Inside Joke](https://github.com/acolytec3/inside-joke) is a very simple web app I built that leverages [libp2p](https://libp2p.io/) to generate ephemeral libp2p nodes in browser that connect via a webRTC star server after exchanging public keys via QR code and then allow you to send encrypted messages back and forth in a reasonably decentralized manner.

![connection screen](https://web3.ninja/static/d8896b007e5a488b12a64bb8920f149d/0b533/connect.png)

![chatting](https://web3.ninja/static/4143a91864c1c72b5706b1d8e5c3c237/0b533/chatting.png)

## How it really works

As noted above, we're using libp2p to make all this work under the hood. Basically, here's what happens:

1. When you first start the app, it creates a libp2p node that generates a 1024 bit RSA key pair and then connects to one of the two Protocol Labs sponsored STAR servers which are used as an initial connection point for the two browsers. This is admittedly not really decentralized but it's the only realistic option at the type I built this app to get us started. Read more about how that works [here](https://github.com/libp2p/js-libp2p-webrtc-star)
2. Once the two nodes make initial contact, we're creating a custom protocol to create a bidirectional connection that's loosely based on the canonical [libp2p chat example](https://github.com/libp2p/js-libp2p/tree/master/examples/chat).
3. To encrypt and decrypt messages, I'm using the cryptographic primitives exposed by `libp2p-crypto` to encrypt and decrypt the messages passed back and forth as obnoxiously long hexadecimal strings.
4. Most importantly, the app lets you know when the other person is talking by showing something equivalent to the bouncing ellipses in iMessage when someone is typing back to you (though admittedly the `Skeleton` component from Chakra-UI is a little less impressive than bouncing ellipses)

Addendum: If you're wondering about those funny robot faces, they are programmatically generated based on a hash of your public key, using [this library](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@digitalungdom/bot-identicon)

So, joke away!

title: Introducing Daisyworld
body:
*Action on behalf of life transforms. Because the relationship between self and the world is reciprocal, it is not a question of first getting enlightened or saved and then acting. As we work to heal the earth, the earth heals us.*

* **Robin Wall Kimmerer, Braiding Sweetgrass**

*If the world is to be healed through human efforts, I am convinced it will be by ordinary people, people whose love for this life is even greater than their fear.*

* **Joanna R. Macy**

![Daisyworld Homeostasis](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/udG1B9al-yl6KBd3dxcU4.png?height=464&width=1526&&&&size=large)

**Daisyworld is an impact DAO powered by a community of radical innovators. We are organisers, designers, scientists, engineers and artists. Together, with your participation, we can address systemic risk. Daisyworld exists to enable [effective regeneering](https://mirror.xyz/0x7F66d195b3a7747E442C843aC86dea7D88f5B48B/Qr45QfByVU_DR5BBpez9CP0kHJAX7DKBmf6RuJAS1N0) of biogeophysical & psychosocial realities.** 

A primary focus for us and a crucial initiative that acts as a keystone for many others is to enable a surface-based solar radiation management system as described by MEER.org [here](https://www.meer.org/whymeer). The MEER Reflection strategy seems crazy at first - we need to cover 3% of Earth’s surface in mirror arrays - but sit with it a moment and consider the context.

The world is realising that due to our lack of climate action solar radiation management is absolutely essential in order to avoid climate breakdown. If we do not take this task into our own hands - as a decentralised sense-making hivemind - our future will be decided for us and the [dangers are significant](https://www.ucsusa.org/resources/what-solar-geoengineering). 

Surface-based solar radiation management is clearly the most effective geoengineering approach [proposed](https://geoengineering.global/solar-radiation-management/). The strategy meets material, economic and time constraints. It would be durable and produce compounding regenerative synergies at micro and macro scales. 

**Our role is to listen and act; sense and respond;  accept our precarious context in human history, and commit to possibility. Whatever that may mean, we will see. Hopefully, Daisyworld can play a role in addressing the [metacrisis](https://consilienceproject.org/about/).**  

Daisyworld is expressly focused on what is possible to create rather than on solving the many problems that exist.  Through imagining possible futures systems of coherence can emerge that are characterised by community, belonging, autonomy, creativity and commitment. 

## Daisyworld is inspired by Gaian processors

[Gaia theory](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaia_hypothesis) describes Earth’s biosphere as a product of all organisms interacting with their inorganic surroundings. Gaia is a synergistic and self-regulating complex system tending towards optimal conditions for life.

The great services generated by our Gaian system are undeniably awesome. Until recently, sapiens have played a key role in ensuring harmony across the multitude of ecosystems and bio-regions we inhabit. However, today our species collectively stands at odds with life. We are fowling our nest and destroying our children's futures. Or more accurately a small percentage of the human population is controlling flows of fossilised energy and the habits of billions.

There are plenty of sceptics who dismiss Gaia theory as being pseudoscientific, [claiming](https://medium.com/science-and-philosophy/the-gaia-hypotheses-science-or-pseudoscience-43831f75f457) that natural selection cannot possibly work at the biosphere level. There are many reasons why traditional evolutionary biology disapprove of Gaia theory. As I understand, Gaia theory describes such a vast complex system - literally every dynamic on Earth - that it cannot be subject to isolation and reductive analysis. It is an intuitive system detectable by the inner wisdom in all of us, and serious scientists hate that idea.

I sense a simple response, that would no doubt be considered naïve, to this criticism is to say “look in the mirror.” We are supposedly the ‘Anthro-’ in Anthropocene. Human beings are the most immense geological force present on this planet today, and, we are self-aware biological agents born from the same evolutionary history as the more-than-human world. For better or worse, we shape and affect every nook and cranny; every habitat and every ecosystem.

Our species has for time immemorial has not only been a Gaian ally but a [Gaian element](https://www.smithsonianmag.com/science-nature/pristine-untouched-amazonian-rainforest-was-actually-shaped-humans-180962378/). Indigenous perspectives and practices work in partnership with the land as part of the land. Many indigenous cultures are fighting for survival, and all of us who have lost our indigenous heritage, can only really survive [The Great Simplification](https://www.thegreatsimplification.com/animations) - as ecological-systems theorist [Nate Hagen](https://soihub.org/site/assets/files/6645/nate-hagens-ecoeconomics-169-2020.pdf) calls it - if we make the regeneration of these living cultures paramount. Not only for their inherent right to exist, but also to learn from, collaborate with, celebrate, and integrate their wisdom into the future stories that will enable regenerative transformation. Because [indigenous thinking can indeed save the world](https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/45449501-sand-talk).

Noam Chomsky issued, once again, a warning to humanity at the American Solar Energy Society's 51st Annual Conference, June 21, 2022, [he said](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jIv-glBvrrc),

> We are at a unique moment in human history. Decisions that must be made right now will determine the course of future history, which is very much in doubt. There is a narrow window in which we must implement measures to avert cataclysmic destruction of the environment. Measures that are quite feasible…

What is currently destroying our future is not human nature or inclination, it is the dominant story . Stories change constantly and it is time to revise the metanarratives that have led us astray. Fortunately, cryptoeconomics is rapidly generating legitimate alternatives to traditional power structures, and [regenerative cryptoeconomics](https://greenpill.party/#book) is enabling win-win-win mechanisms for individuals, communities and the commons.

Daisyworld as a decentralised autonomous organisation (DAO) aims to play a role in regenerating our world. We aim to generate collective imaginations of possible futures and we aim to design funding mechanisms to determine and enable [effective regeneering](https://mirror.xyz/0x7F66d195b3a7747E442C843aC86dea7D88f5B48B/Qr45QfByVU_DR5BBpez9CP0kHJAX7DKBmf6RuJAS1N0).

### Vision

Daisyworld cultivates two things that act in synergy:

1. An environment for [divergent](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/B9780123750389000777) exploration and dialogue to produce collective manifestations of possible futures.
2. A roundtable of [convergence](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Convergent_thinking) and coordination design using decentralised and [polycentric](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Cz0sL2fFjM&t=1s) governance systems.

### Mission

Generate a maximally effective climate emergency response that is holistic and autopoietic.

### Core value proposition:

Decentralising the deployment of [effective regeneering](https://mirror.xyz/0x7F66d195b3a7747E442C843aC86dea7D88f5B48B/Qr45QfByVU_DR5BBpez9CP0kHJAX7DKBmf6RuJAS1N0) initiatives in order to generate maximal beneficial outcomes (MBOs) is the purpose of Daisyworlds existence. This is a vision we can all pursue according to our own unique situations, preferences, motivations and passions.

Regeneering MBOs incorporates subjective and objective accounts of reality. Regeneering is about generating and distributing the [eight forms of capital](http://appleseedpermaculture.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/8_Forms_of_Capital_PM68.pdf) as described by [Appleseed Permaculture](https://www.appleseed.design/).

MBOs are primarily determined using [Warm Data](https://warmdatalab.net/warm-data), which is described as transcontextual information. Traditional data, in contrast, describes only the parts of a system, while Warm Data describes interplay in context. Enabling regeneering initiatives such as [MEER.org](https://www.meer.org/)’s [surfaced based solar radiation management strategy](https://www.meer.org/whymeer) involves dramatically altering massive amounts of landscapes. Warm Data will enable an understanding of the affected communities’ perspectives, including objections, support and innovations.

Daisyworld’s fundamental belief is that cultivating relationships is paramount in generating an effective regenerative transformation. Daisyworld plans to enable a story-sharing initiative called Mycelium Network Dialogue. Sharing our stories in a safe and respectful atmosphere symbiosis naturally emerges, creating a community of belonging. These conversations will catalyse grassroots support and innovation in regeneering planetary systems.

Daisyworld is but one of many impact DAOs determined to ensure planetary homeostasis.

## Values

* Believing in a vital and beautiful future
* Antifragile Systems Thinking
* Polycentric Pluralism
* Fractal Sovereignty
* The Small Group as a Unit of Transformation
* Interbeing - belonging
* Imagination - Liminal Possibility Questing
* Community
* Intuitive Design
* Beauty + Art + Fun
* Public Goods

## Daisyworlds Four Dimensions

### 1) Funding - Receptor

* Fundraising campaigns building relationships while raising [eight forms of capital](http://appleseedpermaculture.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/8_Forms_of_Capital_PM68.pdf).

### 2) Distribution - Effector

* Collectively designed funding distribution mechanisms enabling effective regeneering

### 3) Token - Petals (PTLS)

* Meaningful money energetically tied to regenerative activities.

### 4) Mycelium Network Dialogue (MND)

* MND is a story-sharing technique enabled by web3 [data sovereignty](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Data_sovereignty)
* MND is a generative substrate for collective intelligence and wisdom.

## 1. 英格兰银行副行长：加密货币必须在监管框架内

7月13日消息，英格兰银行（Bank of England）副行长 Jon Cunliffe 将加密货币市场比作一架不安全的飞机：“人们不会在不安全的飞机上待太久。” 他说：“需要一个明确的加密货币监管框架来解决与市场低迷相关的风险。”“加密货币技术提供了真正的金融创新。然而，成功和可持续的创新需要一个可靠管理风险的框架。它必须发生在工作中，”他说。早些时候，他表示，“加密货币也需要在传统金融市场层面进行监管。在传统金融市场中，存在保护投资者免受无法弥补损失的监管。”（Cointelegraph）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/edWJLHAYCqLl_I8JdWMqE.png?height=549&width=976)

## 2. 推特正式对马斯克提起诉讼以强制执行收购协议

7月13日消息，推特已于当地时间周二在美国特拉华州 Chancery 法院对Elon Musk正式提起诉讼。此前这位亿万富翁表示他将终止以 440 亿美元收购该公司的交易。推特表示，马斯克在签订具有约束力的收购协议后，现在“拒绝履行对推特及其股东的义务，因为他签署的交易不再符合他的个人利益。推特在诉书中写道，此次违约是在马斯克一长串重大合同违约事件之后发生的，这些违约行为给 Twitter 及其业务蒙上了一层阴影。Twitter 采取这一行动是为了禁止马斯克进一步违规，迫使马斯克履行其法律义务，并在满足少数未决条件后强制完成合并。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/i-89Tn7K6UNOOuGuZbdG-.png?height=630&width=1200)

唯易WitEx.io是一家业务丰富的数字资产公司，主要包含交易所、资产管理以及挖矿三大业务，均与业内头部公司保持深度合作关系。

title: .earth | a faster way to explore web3
body:
The current experience for users of web3 systems relies on a complex knowledge of the cryptocurrency ecosystem. .earth intends to simplify the user experience.

### the problem: on-chain data is complex

Early adopters of decentralized networks were required to have a layered understanding of blockchain mechanics, language, networks, and applications. While everyone is doing cool things like sending and receiving tokenized assets, participating in the governance of their favorite organizations, and staking assets to earn rewards, most of these actions are difficult to see at once, and require using multiple dapps.

![WEB3 NAVIGATION IS FRAGMENTED](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/c0hP1XQ-uwYf-Pvo0Pq4g.png?height=912&width=1884)

A majority of the experience involves reading granular information to inspect transaction details, verify contracts, or track wallet activity, while being overwhelmed by a multitude of different data variables being presented.

![ON-CHAIN DATA IS COMPLEX](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XuN_Y_2JLquXH0COm1rSs.png?height=614&width=1672)

Understanding what has happened on-chain is not only difficult but also time-consuming, for even the most experienced users. This is our biggest barrier to driving mass adoption and expanding utility for future users. As the web3 ecosystem grows we need to re-think how we communicate and interpret block interactions to onboard new users and achieve greater scale. It’s all about learning with each other in web3, and we’re making that easier.

## our mission: changing the game of block exploration

.earth is changing the game of block exploration. We’re in the business of translating complex transactions on cryptocurrency networks, so you can easily show off and find all the cool stuff that happens on chain.

Instead of looking up a transaction for a 50/50 FTX/ETH LP pair on Uniswap using Etherscan…

![ETHERSCAN SCREENSHOT OF UNISWAP LP ADD](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oGP2gJugh0-y2RNvaZPy-.png?height=543&width=886)

Imagine being presented this image of an LP pool.

![.EARTH GLYPH OF A UNISWAP LP POOL ADD](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JYfIhTZEg4C_dlGoKu_Yi.png?height=586&width=698)

## we’re creating a beautiful visual language that simplifies TXN information

.earth is focused on delivering an experience driven by an easy to understand visual language that is built for mass adoption. We’re **literally building the language of web3, with high fidelity glyphs** of everyday on-chain interactions. Working with the finest graphic and visual designers, data scientists and smart contract developers, we’re bringing you the beautiful, seamless web3 experience we all deserve. Our visual language will set the stage for global recognition of everything web3. Our graphic symbology will quite literally represent the blockchain.

## what we do

Someone just bought an Ape Punk and joined the CryptoPunks community. Check out who they are and what they’ve been doing on Mainnet last week with just a few clicks. Who you are in web3 is first and foremost about what you do on-chain. We make it easy for you to look up users, trends, tokens, events and other activities, so you spend **far less time** being **much more** informed.

![WHAT WE DO](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/wdZ04q_u6gOoA9QdEDigU.png?height=628&width=1812)

Our .earth maps aim to define, capture and share moments and personas as they are happening in real-time. Use our maps to create stories and gather valuable insights on most recent user activity, group behaviors, key trends and major events all within the same visual language.

![HOW IT WORKS](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/TMP-THlBxfPRcBenB2hio.png?height=906&width=1898)

Participate in the next iteration of web3 exploration. We’re going visual and viral. Come discover web3 and tell your story with .earth.

At [Velvet.Capital](https://velvet.capital/) we’re building a multichain DeFi asset management protocol that helps people & institutions create tokenized index funds + other financial products with additional yields. Join our [whitelist](https://velvet.capital/) now for exclusive early access and perks today!

## Crypto Winter & Single Token Risk

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/960/0\*FHYUtDwlk24t6fXU)

Winter is coming. Well it came. It’s here and it’s chilly, brrrrrrr. Not even Hodor can save us now. Actually, it’s not the end of the world even though it might feel like it. The future’s still bright, the builders will keep building & more and more people will join the crypto future. But before we look forward it’s prudent to look back and learn so we can make more informed decisions in the future.

The last few months have been painful for a lot of people, as the market attempts to establish a bottom. Many coins are at multi-year lows and the massive drawdown has put a huge amount of strain on the entire ecosystem. Murmurs of defaults and liquidations loom for some of the previous ‘All-Stars’ in the space- like 3AC (which as of this week has been ordered to liquidate by a British judge; reportedly $16B to \~$20,000), Celsius, BlockFi, etc. We can’t not mention the domino that set off the whole unraveling- Terra Luna Classic.

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*iY3YpNZET1MogvgC)

During the month of April 2022, Terra Luna Classic was still looked at as a darling; one that you could HODL in perpetuity for the safest, most epic returns of your life. People were so hardened in this belief that they went all-in on the investment. Inevitably, like most things in life, the things that sound too good to be true usually turn out to be just that. LUNA’s price came crashing down in the month of May in historical fashion. As I write this article, it is trading at fractions of a penny, which is a very steep drop from its all-time high of 119.18 USD. You don’t have to be a math wiz to recognize that’s not the kind of return on investment that you want.

## Lessons to be Learned

![Pondering HODL'er](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oXNSRFNAc0He2TTIckYF9.png?height=1050&width=1050)

> “How can we ensure we minimize our risk while maximizing our return? I could easily diversify by buying tons of coins, but how will I know which coins are best and how much to hold of each?”- Pondering HODL’er

Past results are not indicative of future results. Time and time again, investors attempt to predict the future and almost always fail. Crypto is no exception to this rule. Nothing goes straight to the moon- there are always peaks and valleys. Many people get caught falling in love with a project or a few projects then going all-in thinking the good times will always roll. Not a good idea. All emerging sectors go through bull and bear cycles. If you can’t be disciplined and responsible in your allocations of capital you will be burned ( this rule transcends the average person and includes massive organizations like 3AC, BlockFi, Celsius, Luna, etc). People are people- they can all make the same kind of mental mistakes.

The key is positioning yourself to reap the rewards of the bull and survive the bear with minimal damage. You do this by practicing discipline at market tops and market bottoms which is easier said than done. In tradfi markets, professional investors do this by creating balanced portfolios across sectors and asset classes. However, there aren’t many great solutions out there in crypto for this. Right now, there are a lot of DeFi posers (CeDeFi) out there that champion the principles of DeFi but are actually centralized- like Celscius.

It is fully transparent, trustless, and non-custodial- so no risk of having your assets seized (we’re looking at you Coinbase & Celsius).

## Velvet.Capital Secret Sauce

title: Sybil detection on DeFi protocols
body:
In April, [Primitive](https://primitive.xyz/) launched its first product, [RMM-01](https://primitive.mirror.xyz/Audtl29HY_rnhN4E2LwnP7-zjDcDGAyXZ4h3QpDeajg), a decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol that allows users to earn trading fees from automated trading. When the protocol reached nearly 1000 cumulative users, we analyzed the accounts to determine their authenticity.

On the RMM-01 protocol, nearly 80% of users were identified as suspects in Sybil attacks. In response, Primitive developed a straightforward method for detecting and filtering these users. While Primitive uses this tool to remove noise that Sybil attacks impose on user data, other DeFi protocols can expand the open-source code to suit a large array of their own needs.

### What is a Sybil attack?

DeFi protocols commonly use airdrops as a method to launch tokens. This method rewards early users of the protocol by "airdropping," or giving, the users free tokens. Sybil attacks can be initiated to exploit airdrops in DeFi protocols.

The term "Sybil attack" originates from the main character in ["Sybil"](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sybil_(Schreiber_book)) by Flora Rheta Schreiber. The book details a case study of a young girl who is thought to have Dissociative Identity Disorder. It was later revealed that the entire story was a ruse and Shirley Mason, the woman who inspired the character of Sybil, fabricated the different identities. In a Sybil attack, an entity generates a large quantity of pseudo-anonymous identities, akin to Sybil's multiple personalities in the book, to obtain a large influence over a network.

A common example of a Sybil attack is when a user, in anticipation of an airdrop, generates a large number of addresses, then deposits and removes tiny amounts of value from a DeFi protocol. This is referred to as "airdrop farming," and is often facilitated algorithmically. Protocol developers look down upon airdrop farming because their goal is to reward engaged and authentic users; not bots.

### Sybil attacks on the RMM-01 protocol

Upon launching the RMM-01 protocol, the Primitive team set up a monitoring infrastructure to notify us when users add and remove liquidity. As the Total Value Locked (TVL) grew, we noticed a large quantity of the notifications were for very small amounts of liquidity that were almost immediately removed after they were added. The large volume of small transactions indicated that Liquidity Providers (LPs) were Sybil-ing the protocol in anticipation of an airdrop.

The noise from the Sybil attacks made it difficult to analyze the authentic user activity on the RMM-01 protocol. We realized the need to filter accounts that orchestrated Sybil attacks so that we could gain a more accurate understanding of the value that users derived from the protocol. After the accounts associated with Sybil attacks were filtered out, our data better reflected the activity of our unique users.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/lodt8_PixXA6_j1cDqh7-.png?height=480&width=640)

The script that we built in response to Sybil attacks serves as a tool for more accurately quantifying authentic users. At Primitive, we use the information derived from this process to better inform data-driven decisions and improve the RMM-01 protocol experience for our users. The script is fairly agnostic, so it can benefit other DeFi protocols in the same ways that it does RMM-01, or it can be extended to fit a wide array of needs for protocol developers.

### Open-source method to filter Sybil attackers

In response to Sybil attacks on the RMM-01 protocol, the Primitive team has identified a straightforward methodology for compiling lists of addresses associated with Sybil attacks. Once this list is generated, the associated addresses can be blacklisted and disregarded.

The methodology and the corresponding detection scripts are open-source and can be found [here](https://github.com/primitivefinance/sybil-detection). This approach is ideal because anyone can use a small script on relevant contracts for their benefit. The script is configured by entering your `ETHERSCAN_API` key and `CONTRACT_TO_LOOK_AT`  in a `.env` file.

The script queries a contract's transactions using the Etherscan API and compiles a list of addresses that interacted with the configured contract. Then, the script filters out transactions where no value was exchanged (such as token approvals). After this, the cost of the transaction is checked by multiplying the user's `cumulativeGasUsed` by `gasPrice`. If the cost of the transaction is greater than the `value` of the transaction, the script adds this address to an array of Sybil suspects.

### Future work

There are many ways to make this script more robust. One approach is to query all transactions from the Sybil suspects and check if they are a collection of deposits with the same `value`. This is a clear indication that the Sybil suspect's address is farming airdrops.

\*Disclaimer: Primitive does not have a token or plans to release a token.

title: GID今日话题：stepn（7月14日分析）
body:
**一、关于更新预告**

随着第三领域开启时间的临近，官方最近动作不断，针对大家关心的问题简要进行分析：

**（一）“715”**

自“715”公告出来后，我们多次强调，“715”不是问题。在繁荣市场，可以通过各种委托——代理机制搞定，无非是利润分配问题。在低迷市场，官方会自行解决，毕竟项目都要死了，还管什么合不合规，把用户往外推这种情况不太可能发生。

上周我们“715”解决具体方案提出了更为详细的分析：最好的方案是淡化“715”，只谈“边缘计算”。之前有小伙伴讨论过这个“边缘计算”的技术难度和落地，但无论如何，stepn都会在715时让“边缘计算”上线，因此“边缘计算”的真伪，其实并不重要。从jerry在DC中的回复可以看出，“边缘计算”确实能如期上线，但是这句放在末尾的”PS”，显得又底气不足。这时候就应该昂首挺胸的说，我们“边缘计算”技术能更保证玩家在哪里都能玩。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9aW1asGYuPhWJZxXej3_r.jpg?height=2532&width=1170)

**（二）关于鞋子的“HP”**

其实早在3月底就有很多玩家提出过，建议给鞋子一个HP值，并与“comfortable”属性挂钩。当时还有人在DC中将学英语的人物生命值作为例子。HP值确实在一定程度上可以延长游戏寿命，但是stepn项目方初期就没有这方面的设定。这次将HP值弄出来，只能说由于鞋子市场的巨额存量，让项目方不得不走回了传统gamefi老路，但感觉为时太晚。

目前看来，HP值的设定就是多增加了一种消耗场景。说白了，就是修鞋消耗的资源不够，需要多一个渠道迫使玩家来消耗资源。玩家每次运动时都会缓慢减少鞋子的HP值。HP值需要使用gst、gmt和红宝石来恢复。按照官方的说法，高级鞋蓝、紫等HP值下降很慢，HP可以用很久。因此，HP值这波操作，依旧旨在消耗灰鞋市场的存量。

预计根据后面的计算公式，恢复灰鞋HP的价格会较高，重新购买一双鞋会更划算。这样市场就会出现很多报废的灰鞋。

但只能说这个功能出来的太晚了，目前除了增加玩家们的预期成本、缩短回本周期、打击继续游戏的信心之外，没有任何作用。

**二、关于市场**

大盘：长线依旧还是下跌趋势，这波反弹后，还会有更低点。短线昨天消息日的“表演”可谓十分精彩，这波又让大盘的下跌有了喘息之机。还在市场坚持的，这波空军衣服赶紧换了，现在加入多军，一起嗨几天。

stepn：sol链的gst这波期货市场不再硬撑了（毕竟和bsc链gst走势背离太多），直接暴砸，sol链gst回归了应有的市场价格平台。明天715，市场或许会迎来一波小反弹，毕竟大盘也在弹，再看看官方出什么更新和利好，或者直接第三链与大更新齐上。那么鞋子市场会迎来一波反弹。这时候不是给大家加仓的，还是之前说的，逢高出货，最后逃命一波即将来临。

**三、关于回本周期**

sol链由于gst价格大幅下跌，瞬时回本周期继续拉长，约120-140天。bsc链目前mint有一定收益，瞬时回本周期缩减至50-70天。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/j5BFY4gMGevOeWyNuWfaz.jpg?height=3184&width=2820&size=large)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/EkH5_50lnmqKj5ZQKpv_4.jpg?height=2960&width=3014&size=large)

**四、关于mint收益**

sol链暂停mint，bsc链mint有一定收益。注意，虽然按理论计算，绿绿mint收益是灰灰mint的一倍，但bsc链目前蓝鞋的流动性很差。观察市场可以看到，00的地板蓝几天都卖不出。因此，用灰灰mint就行。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Ihqaxx1BzIdntKoQh9CiW.jpg?height=2382&width=1510)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ykREqqrGCp-BkntCAQTHw.jpg?height=2400&width=1416)

**五、关于合成收益**

sol链合成收益净亏损值减少至200U以内，bsc链合成收益净亏损值重新回归到230U左右。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ARsuxeMbohL4LwyehG7wg.jpg?height=484&width=1916)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/eDsECkKM1gdb_q1nXMkYM.jpg?height=484&width=1904)

body:

2022年7月13日16:00，EOS Quiz问答活动第十三期在EOS网络基金会Discord中文频道举行。参与回答问题的用户均可获得NFTs (POP Tokens)，而NFTs (POP Tokens)可在Discord福利活动中兑换20 EOS及更多精美周边实物奖励！

这一期EOS Quiz活动，我们为大家准备了哪些关于EOS的精彩知识点呢？

本文为本次活动的精彩内容回顾，内容有所编辑。

> **问题一：近日，Yves撰文谈论GameFi并在纳斯达克发表，里面提到的DAGG指的是什么？**

答案：

DAGG全称 Decentralized Autonomous Gaming Guilds，指 去中心化的自治游戏公会」。关于Yves的这篇文章，我们将在近期整理翻译并发布。

[https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/decentralized-autonomous-gaming-guilds-are-essential-to-build-up-gamefi](https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/decentralized-autonomous-gaming-guilds-are-essential-to-build-up-gamefi)

> **问题二：Pomelo第三季的资助申请将于什么时候开放？**

答案：

Pomelo第三季的资助申请将于[7月19日](https://medium.com/@PomeloGrants/let-the-pomelo-season-3-festivities-begin-69f18d6a0d34#ad82)开放，另外个人贡献者捐赠的开放时间为7月27日。

* 7 月 19 日 — 8 月 8 日：[公共基础产品](https://medium.com/@EOSNetworkFoundation/eos%E5%9F%BA%E9%87%91%E4%BC%9A%E6%90%BA%E6%89%8Bpomelo-%E5%BB%BA%E8%AE%BE%E5%85%AC%E5%85%B1%E5%9F%BA%E7%A1%80-%E6%BF%80%E5%8F%91%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%BB%B7%E5%80%BC-b5b35c3ee7de)可以创建并提交资助申请。 在创建申请后，Pomelo 团队会批准符合条件的资助申请。
* 7 月 27 日 — 8 月 17 日：捐助者可以将 EOS 捐赠给您最喜欢的资助申请，并通过捐赠影响匹配池资金的分配。
* 8 月 17 日之后：Pomelo 团队分析结果，并将匹配池资金分配给通过 KYC 的合格资助申请。

  [https://medium.com/@PomeloGrants/let-the-pomelo-season-3-festivities-begin-69f18d6a0d34](https://medium.com/@PomeloGrants/let-the-pomelo-season-3-festivities-begin-69f18d6a0d34)


> **问题三：在知名加密数据网站DappRadar的游戏类别分类中，按用户量排名的前四名游戏分别是什么？**

答案：

前四名分别是Alien worlds（WAX链），Splinterlands（WAX链），Farmers World（WAX链），和Upland（EOS链）

值得一提的是大约55%的流行的GameFi dApp 都是使用我们（EOSIO）的技术构建的（备注：WAX是EOS的姐妹链，也是EOSIO联盟的成员之一）。

[https://dappradar.com/rankings/category/games](https://dappradar.com/rankings/category/games)

> **问题四：国内最近很流行的数字藏品，与大家熟悉的NFT有什么区别呢？**

答案：

相同点：

两者技术上并没有本质的差别，都是基于区块链这一项技术的

不同点：

首先，前者是基于联盟链的（如蚂蚁链和超级链）；后者是基于公链的（如EOS和以太坊）。

其次，前者金融属性较弱，一般用于收藏或者转增；后者金融属性比较强，可在二级市场上交易。

> **问题五：CPI指的是什么？指数高好还是低好？**

答案：

全称 Consumer Price Index，指「消费者物价指数」，它是衡量[通货膨胀](https://zh.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%80%9A%E8%B4%A7%E8%86%A8%E8%83%80)的主要指标之一。

一般定义超过3％为通货膨胀，超过5％就是比较严重的通货膨胀。

知识点：美国5月份CPI同比上涨8.6%，6月份的数据即将公布。

title: US Senate confirms Michael Barr as Fed vice chair for supervision
body:
The United States Senate has confirmed the nomination of law professor Michael Barr to become the next vice chair for supervision for the Federal Reserve.

In a 66-28 vote on the Senate floor on Wednesday, U.S. lawmakers [confirmed](https://www.senate.gov/legislative/floor_activity_pail.htm) Barr as vice chair for supervision of the Federal Reserve System for four years, filling the last seat on the seven-member board of governors. Barr, who was on the advisory board of Ripple Labs from 2015 to 2017, also served as the Treasury Department’s assistant secretary for financial institutions under former President Barack Obama, and taught courses on financial regulation at the University of Michigan.

As vice chair for supervision, Barr will be responsible for developing policy recommendations for the Fed as well as overseeing the supervision and regulation of certain financial institutions, second only to chair Jerome Powell. According to the White House, he [was](https://www.whitehouse.gov/briefing-room/statements-releases/2022/04/15/statement-from-president-biden-on-his-intent-to-nominate-michael-barr-to-serve-as-vice-chair-for-supervision-of-the-federal-reserve/) “a key architect” of the 2010 Dodd-Frank Act — legislation that continues to influence financial policy in the United States, and set up the position of vice chair for supervision.

During his confirmation hearing before the Senate Banking Committee in May, Barr [said innovative technologies including cryptocurrencies](https://cointelegraph.com/news/biden-s-pick-for-fed-vice-chair-for-supervision-calls-for-congressional-action-on-stablecoins) had “some potential for upside in terms of economic benefit” but also “some significant risks.” He called on lawmakers to create a regulatory framework on stablecoins to prevent the risk of runs.

In a statement on his intention to nominate Barr in April, President Joe Biden said he wanted to push the candidate through quickly, likely because the position had been vacant since Fed governor Randal Quarles’ term ended in October 2021. The Senate [confirmed Lael Brainard for a four-year term](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-senate-confirms-lael-brainard-as-fed-vice-chair) as Fed vice chair in April, and Powell as Fed chair in May. Barr is the last major candidate put forth by Biden for the Fed to be confirmed.

“Barr has strong support from across the political spectrum — and has been confirmed by the Senate on a bipartisan basis,” said Biden in April. “He understands that this job is not a partisan one, but one that plays a critical role in regulating our nation’s financial institutions to ensure Americans are treated fairly and to protect the stability of our economy.”

Biden’s first nominee for the Fed vice chair of supervision, Sarah Bloom Raskin, withdrew her name from consideration in March citing “relentless attacks by special interests” and referred to Republican lawmakers who “held hostage” her nomination since February. Wednesday’s Senate vote suggested that more than 15 Republicans joined Democrats in confirming Barr.

***Related: [How does the Fed impact crypto?](https://cointelegraph.com/news/how-does-the-fed-impact-crypto-find-out-on-the-market-report)***

The Fed, in addition to the Securities and Exchange Commission and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, [oversees many of the regulations](https://cointelegraph.com/news/fed-s-lael-brainard-invites-congress-to-choose-whether-to-compete-with-china-s-digital-yuan) covering [digital assets](https://cointelegraph.com/bitcoin-for-beginners) and financial institutions in the United States. Upon Barr taking his position, a full seven members will sit on the Fed’s board of governors — an event which has not happened in roughly ten years.

title: BIS committee and IOSCO issue guidance for regulation of stablecoin arrangements
body:
The principle of "same risk, same regulation" for crypto received further confirmation with the release Wednesday of new guidance on stablecoin arrangements (SAs). The guidance, issued by the Bank for International Settlements (BIS) Committee on Payments and Market Infrastructures (CPMI) and International Organization of Securities Commissions (IOSCO), [applies](https://www.bis.org/cpmi/publ/d101a.pdf) the Principles for Financial Market Infrastructures (PFMI) for payment, clearing and settlement systems to systemically important SAs that transfer stablecoins. 

The document is intended for use by SA designers and operators and extends the PFMI standards to SAs without establishing new standards. It notes:

> “An SA may need to make changes to its rules, procedures, governance arrangements and risk management framework taking the guidance into consideration in order for its practices to be consistent with the PFMI.”

It [defines](https://www.bis.org/cpmi/publ/d206.pdf) a stablecoin arrangement as “an arrangement that combines a range of functions to provide an instrument that purports to be used as a means of payment and/or store of value.” The guidance suggests considerations for determining which SAs it applies to, since only to SAs that are “systemically important” are covered by it.

***Related: [IOSCO says DeFi is quickly evolving and 'cloning financial markets'](https://cointelegraph.com/news/iosco-says-defi-is-quickly-evolving-and-cloning-financial-markets)***

The PFMI were created in response to the 2008 financial crisis and published in 2012. All the standards apply to SAs under the new guidance, although the authors chose to elaborate on the application of only four out of the 24 principles and key considerations: governance, risk management, settlement finality and money settlements. They noted that a separate work will be issued to cover multicurrency SAs.

United States commodity Futures Trading Commission commissioner Caroline D. Pham, co-chair of the CPMI-lOSCO Policy Standing Group, said in a statement Wednesday, “This report is a significant step to establish international standards for stablecoin arrangements and a cohesive regulatory framework that safeguards the global financial system.”

Other institutions are working on stablecoin regulation as well. The Financial Stability Board is [expected to propose international regulations](https://cointelegraph.com/news/g20-regulator-to-present-global-crypto-rules-in-october-2022) for stablecoins in October. In the U.S., the Stablecoin TRUST Act [has been introduced to regulate stablecoin](https://cointelegraph.com/news/the-united-states-turns-its-attention-to-stablecoin-regulation) and integrate them into the financial system.

## Posted on \*date blocked (third post)

In the stale quietness of the hospital room, I wake up to the disappointment of not having died last night. Already in a room tight enough for a tomb, I lie there, craving for oblivion. But Leah has other plans for me. She is beside me, thumbing the space on my forehead between my eyebrows. I hear the beeping of a heart monitor. Every time I blink, Leah's face doubles, then slowly merges back into one face, then doubles again with another blink.

"Where am I?" I lift my arm to see if I can. An I.V. needle pierces the back of my hand.

"You're at…St. Mike's," Leah squeezes my shoulder. "You're…okay now."

"I killed them," I whisper.

"Those...those were terrible things you wrote. But you didn’t...do those things. You just…wrote them. That's all you did."

I look at her and see someone brave now—decisive. She speaks firmly, and I believe her. "Just leave me," I close my eyes.

"I'm not leaving you. I'm...I'm going to help you," Leah hushes me.

A nurse enters. "Sorry. It's passed eleven, he needs to rest."

Leah nods and the nurse leaves.

"I was in the…hospital once, too, remember?” Leah leans over me. “Do you remember what helped me?" She presses her lips on my forehead and blackness plows over me.

I wake up again, gasping for air. The beeping of the heart monitor fills the dark room. Florescent light from the hallway pours in through the open door. A figure in the room casts a shadow on my face. The figure is tall and thin, its arms long at its side.

"Hey fam," the figure says in William's voice.

The rhythmic beeping of the heart monitor speeds up.

William walks closer and I toil to lift my head for a better look at him. His face is cloaked in shadow from the hallway lights behind him.

"You're not real," I force out the words.

"I’m not?" William chuckles.

It’s just the meds, I think to myself. I close my eyes expecting the voice to stop speaking. But it doesn't.

"We’re getting closer now," William says.

"Closer to what?" I say, thinking that speaking back to a specter of my imagination would make it go away, but the vision of William only becomes clearer.

"To God," William says.

I shake my head and the pillow makes crumpling noises under my head.

"Soon these shit and piss filled bodies of ours won't exist, but we will," William squeezes my foot under the sheets, and I'm shocked at the solid feeling of his touch.

"You don't exist," I whisper, the beeping of the heart monitor slowing down. "You don't exist," I repeat, slipping into sleep.

title: NFT 空投是利好吗？怎么操作？
body:
本文为NFTGO研究院作品，点此看[英文原文](https://nftgo.io/research/How-Is-the-Market-Reacting-to-NFT-Airdrops+vE9kDHbhYqoXT3EYCoWn-inVF2miOKjJpaedI7C0uG8)

由 [@BTCdayu](https://twitter.com/BTCdayu) 转译为中文

## 关键要点

* 在空投发生之前，主要收藏品会提高底价。这通常发生在几天前或宣布空投时。
* 辅助集合与主集合的性能相关。
* 投资者对空投的评估与他们各自的收藏类似。这是因为他们共享完全相同的路线图、团队和社区。
* 一旦空投被释放，投资者就会受到对未来效用的猜测的驱使。

近几个月来，空投变得很流行。在二次收藏被铸造后，新的实用程序被提供给持有者。这些实用程序差异很大，具体取决于给定的集合。它们通常包括但不限于化身、能力和标记。我们发现，在空投发生后不久，这些收藏品的持有者数量显着增加。

## 市场反应

市场对空投的反应对于每个系列都是独一无二的。反应通常由构建团队的质量、社区的质量、持有鲸鱼的数量以及交易者用来评估收藏品的各种其他指标等因素决定。这些其他指标以及上述指标都可以在[NFTGo.io](http://nftgo.io/)上找到。

### BAYC 生态系统

Bored Ape Yacht Club 是 Blue-Chip NFT 以及新系列进入该领域的黄金标准。BAYC 社区为其持有者提供了最多的空投，很明显，这是他们继续在 NFT 市场上如此强大的一个重要原因。每次空投时，初级收藏（BAYC）的持有者数量一直在增加。

![BAYC，持有者趋势：鲸鱼被定义为 NFT 持有价值超过 1,000,000 美元的投资者/持有者。（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cNxkGNr4Vv9FgS6DQtr-Y.png?height=386&width=1133)

Otherside 系列为 BAYC 和 MAYC 带来了历史性数量的鲸鱼。空投前几天，有近 600 头鲸鱼在 BAYC。记录的鲸鱼数量与 BAYC 的历史底价相关，将底价推高至 150 ETH。

根据持有者趋势，底价上涨与空投之间存在很强的相关性。

![无聊猿游艇俱乐部生态系统（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MgQASHaBQg7DLINbC-lgR.png?height=2160&width=3840)

但是，重要的是要注意市场在空投发生后不久就会迅速自我纠正。此外，随着主要收藏的成熟，我们看到长期持有者的增加，通常成为最主要的持有期。

![BAYC，持有期趋势（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/vjEhgUGq7NX1dDOeqc9Ub.png?height=440&width=1280)

### 克隆 X 生态系统

Clone X 在一个月内完成了所有空投。尽管它们早期下降，但它们仍在吸引新的持有者和新的鲸鱼。

![Clone X，持有者趋势（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/iF2IpqHgAyjI2V5jsxjaF.png?height=427&width=1280)

Clone X 和 RTFKT MNLTH 都看到空投的底价上涨。虽然 Clone X 的价值增长比 MNLTH 大得多，但此后不久也出现了更显着的修正。

![Clone X 生态系统（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/mTruSu9-zFuZg6z-RgH03.png?height=2160&width=3840)

### Azuki 生态系统

Azuki 团队是该领域最杰出的团队之一。他们通过创建自己的智能合约来创新智能合约，使用户能够降低他们的 gas 费用并以几乎与铸币 1 相同的成本铸币多个 NFT。

尽管涉及 Azuki 的一位创始人的丑闻，但持有者趋势并没有太大变化。然而，投资该项目的鲸鱼因此下降了 13%。

就其对空投的反应而言，我们看到在第一次空投后鲸鱼数量持续增加，然后在第二次空投到来时蓝筹股持有者大幅增加。（我们的蓝筹持有者指标是新的，所以我们没有关于第一次空投的数据。）

![Azuki，持有者趋势（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MpJxmpJDXwyAPcK_2WGNJ.png?height=411&width=1198)

当他们的第一次空投到达时，Azuki 的底价飙升。然后由于他们的大丑闻，地板价格急剧下降。然而，当他们宣布他们的第二次空投时，我们看到了轻微的增加。就空投如何影响底价而言，第二个数字应该持保留态度，因为我们在这里看到的主要是由丑闻引起的。如果我们关注第一次下跌，我们可以看到它们会对项目的底价产生重大影响。在查看这样的图表时，将新闻考虑在内也很重要。

![Azuki 生态系统（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_xeVT2o9ug_You3ZCIFYT.png?height=2160&width=3840)

## 并非每次空投都能顺利进行

虽然一些蓝筹股在空投方面做得很好，但情况并非总是如此。重要的是要了解在分析集合的数据时需要考虑许多不同的指标。仅仅因为宣布了空投并不意味着它总是会帮助一个项目。

Karafuru 的空投对主要收藏没有催化剂，甚至在空投前几天也没有。值得注意的是，此时整个市场经历了巨大的低迷，因此空投无法帮助他们的事实可能与恶劣的市场条件有关。

![Karafuru 生态系统（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ybeq7PZ8gC2UeauBArxA6.png?height=2160&width=3840)

一旦未公开的 Gachapon 系列触及二级市场，它就会从 0.41 ETH 大幅上涨至 0.78 ETH。此后不久，抛售压力开始出现，超过 80 只鲸鱼卖出了该系列中的 1 个或多个 NFT。

![Karafuru Gachapon（未公开）（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8-DkKaFf0XNFir48srttC.png?height=548&width=1280)

另一方面，从 Gachapon 透露的 NFT 与未透露的相比反映了“实际底价”。由于市场现在知道 NFT 特征，底价下降是很常见的，主要影响包含共同特征的 NFT。不过值得一提的是，由于投资者了解二级收藏品的特点，最稀有的作品开始以当时的底价约 3 倍的价格成交。

![Karafuru Gachapon（已公开）（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WspFE8Hb7kDztooD4h4Vz.png?height=529&width=1280)

与 Karafurus 空投相反，Moonbirds 在空投前后一直保持稳定。

![Moonbirds 生态系统（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/5O0nxK-JlfFiNaieCPJ6T.png?height=2160&width=3840)

与 Karafurus 类似，Moonbirds Oddities 曾在二级市场上大放异彩。奇怪的事情还没有透露，这就是为什么过去几周价格保持不变的原因。

![Moonbirds Oddities（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3CVbXNbWIKrBuYkUMhWrO.png?height=412&width=981)

## 空投在主要收藏品方面的价值

信不信由你，空投从未超过主收藏价值的 50%。

![无聊猿游艇俱乐部，收藏价值（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/q1otuXwmLlTTAHnladFdV.png?height=490&width=883)

![克隆 X，收藏价值（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/92RMtbi8mK6uAB0ltXzyV.png?height=493&width=892)

![Azuki，收藏价值（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xcHm_ywaQHvhwN3PkEEfA.png?height=506&width=887)

在上面的示例中，我们可以看到 Clone X 生态系统几乎接近主收藏总价值的 50% 大关，在该组中最高。

主要收藏品仍然推动着生态系统的表现。空投的价值低于主要 NFT 收藏的 50% 就表明了这一点。

## 预计空投

一旦团队宣布即将进行的空投，收藏的数量就会立即开始飙升。看看 Murakami Flowers，一旦该组织宣布，底价在数小时内从约 2.5 ETH 升至约 5.0 ETH，然后在 3.9 ETH 附近找到了盘整点。

![Murakami.Flowers，价格（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/loAPJL275quwP772fQIFW.png?height=523&width=1280)

投机推动投资者抬高价格。Sartoshi 为 mfers 社区提供了“下一个时代”的日期和时间。细节未披露，但投资者受到预期的驱使，这导致底价上涨 1 ETH。

![Mfers，价格（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/sdrzYodf5zMcphbZEc5_L.png?height=512&width=1280)

## 空投指数表现

NFT 在过去 30 天中损失了近 50% 的美元价值。另一方面，空投指数（ETH）从 6 月份的下跌中恢复得比美元更快，从底部上涨了近 45%。如下图所示，一旦交易者和投资者认识到市场状态，他们倾向于以“ETH 价值”进行交易，从而形成以太坊的积累阶段。

![空投指数最近 30 天（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/OeLW4f1Ny-jsZfsvOQy-3.png?height=436&width=782)

虽然从大局来看，BAYC 生态系统最古老的集合在 ETH 方面在 2022 年表现良好，BAKC 和 MAYC 分别增长了 40% 和 45%。然而，BAYC 土地是 2022 年贬值幅度最大的资产，美元贬值 94%，ETH 贬值 85%。

![2022 年空投表现：BAYC 生态系统（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9Jtbimn_13TCKv7lR544L.png?height=434&width=777)

目前克隆 X 空投在 2022 年的 ETH 价值表现最好：MNLTH 增长 12.43%，Space Pod 增长 214.11%，PodX 是唯一一个从年初到 2022 年 6 月 21 日下降 62.41%。

![2022 年空投表现：Clone X 生态系统（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/EG34xVVhhxkvAFCDZQzNZ.png?height=441&width=808)

考虑到每个蓝筹项目的主要空投集合，除了 Cool Pets ($ETH) 从 2022 年的高点上涨了 8% 之外，所有这些项目的美元和 ETH 价值都损失了至少 25%。

Dooplicator 是其大部分价值下降的收藏品。它从 ATH 暴跌了 95%。但是，上图中提到的空投没有考虑空投奖励（例如 MAYC 持有者的 MAYC Land）。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UxCVAZNfaYIsoYS_7eG0T.png?height=440&width=787)

## 结论

空投可以被视为 NFT 集合生态系统的催化剂。尽管如此，随着炒作开始消退，并且由于没有直接的效用，价格开始调整。抛售压力开始是因为许多人想从“免费空投”中获利。这些方案并不适用于所有集合。有些人会成功空投，但有些人不会在价格中看到反映。

值得注意的是，主收藏与NFT空投收藏之间的市场表现存在相关性。由于两个项目共享相同的路线图，投资者根据相似的指标对它们进行定价：社区、路线图、团队、实用程序等。

也许项目应该首先关注建立一个由真正的信徒（包括鲸鱼）组成的强大社区。否则，一旦确认空投，人们就会开始倾倒他们的行李。

此外，当一个项目即将向其社区发布空投时，值得考虑以下问题：

1. 艺术作品与主要收藏品相似吗？
2. 团队为生态系统增加了多少供应？
3. 团队筹集了多少资金，这笔钱将如何帮助团队实现目标？
4. 目前主要收藏中有多少 OG 持有者？
5. 辅助集合是否添加到实用程序？

title: BIS committee and IOSCO issue guidance for regulation of stablecoin arrangements
body:
The principle of "same risk, same regulation" for crypto received further confirmation with the release Wednesday of new guidance on stablecoin arrangements (SAs). The guidance, issued by the Bank for International Settlements (BIS) Committee on Payments and Market Infrastructures (CPMI) and International Organization of Securities Commissions (IOSCO), [applies](https://www.bis.org/cpmi/publ/d101a.pdf) the Principles for Financial Market Infrastructures (PFMI) for payment, clearing and settlement systems to systemically important SAs that transfer stablecoins. 

The document is intended for use by SA designers and operators and extends the PFMI standards to SAs without establishing new standards. It notes:

> “An SA may need to make changes to its rules, procedures, governance arrangements and risk management framework taking the guidance into consideration in order for its practices to be consistent with the PFMI.”

It [defines](https://www.bis.org/cpmi/publ/d206.pdf) a stablecoin arrangement as “an arrangement that combines a range of functions to provide an instrument that purports to be used as a means of payment and/or store of value.” The guidance suggests considerations for determining which SAs it applies to, since only to SAs that are “systemically important” are covered by it.

***Related: [IOSCO says DeFi is quickly evolving and 'cloning financial markets'](https://cointelegraph.com/news/iosco-says-defi-is-quickly-evolving-and-cloning-financial-markets)***

The PFMI were created in response to the 2008 financial crisis and published in 2012. All the standards apply to SAs under the new guidance, although the authors chose to elaborate on the application of only four out of the 24 principles and key considerations: governance, risk management, settlement finality and money settlements. They noted that a separate work will be issued to cover multicurrency SAs.

United States commodity Futures Trading Commission commissioner Caroline D. Pham, co-chair of the CPMI-lOSCO Policy Standing Group, said in a statement Wednesday, “This report is a significant step to establish international standards for stablecoin arrangements and a cohesive regulatory framework that safeguards the global financial system.”

Other institutions are working on stablecoin regulation as well. The Financial Stability Board is [expected to propose international regulations](https://cointelegraph.com/news/g20-regulator-to-present-global-crypto-rules-in-october-2022) for stablecoins in October. In the U.S., the Stablecoin TRUST Act [has been introduced to regulate stablecoin](https://cointelegraph.com/news/the-united-states-turns-its-attention-to-stablecoin-regulation) and integrate them into the financial system.

title: China's central bank to expand deployment of e-CNY
body:
According to China's state [institution](http://www.gov.cn/xinwen/2022-07/13/content_5700838.htm) Xinhua News Agency, Lan Zou, head of monetary policy at the People's Bank of China (PBoC), announced that the country would be expanding the number of digital yuan (e-CNY) test sites in the country from 11 to 23. They are spread out across 15 out of 31 of China's provinces and autonomous regions. The PBoC is China's central bank and is responsible for the development of the e-CNY central bank digital currency, or CBDC. During Wednesday's press conference, Zou praised the success of the recent e-CNY rollout, stating: 

> "e-CNY trials during the first half of 2022, such as acting as a means of payment during the [Beijing Olympics](https://cointelegraph.com/news/here-s-how-much-digital-yuan-used-at-olympics-according-to-pboc), were spectacularly successful. The e-CNY has demonstrated to be an invaluable tool in improving quality of life, stimulating consumption, growing internal demand, and ensuring steady economic development through its functions such as smart contract utility.

In its latest data update, Chinese consumers have spent a cumulative 264 million transactions amounting to 83 billion CNY ($12.35 billion) as of May 31. More than 4,567,000 merchants across the country have begun accepting the CBDC. For the next steps, Zou says the PBoC plans to further increase the number of e-CNY test sites and enhance its technological capabilities.

During China's ongoing strict coronavirus lockdowns, provincial and municipal officials frequently partnered with the country's tech enterprises to unveil [e-CNY airdrops](https://cointelegraph.com/news/city-of-shenzhen-airdrops-30m-in-free-digital-yuan-to-stimulate-consumer-spending). Users who received digital yuan could then spend the "gift" at specified platforms and in-app merchant terminals as part of an initiative to revitalize consumer spending. Aside from consumer goods, the e-CNY can be used to pay for various bills, such as taxes, at various municipalities.

title: BREAKING: Celsius reportedly filing for bankruptcy 'imminently'
body:
Crypto lending platform Celsius has reportedly filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy, with its lawyers starting to notify individual U.S. state regulators as of Wednesday, July 13.

The news was [reported](https://www.cnbc.com/2022/07/13/embattled-crypto-lender-celsius-informs-state-regulators-that-its-filing-for-bankruptcy-imminently-source-says-.html) by CNBC and referred to an unnamed source, who asked not to be named as the proceedings were private. They said that the company planned to file the Chapter 11 paperwork “imminently.”

It comes just days after the embattled lending platform replaced its previously hired law firm Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP with [Kirkland & Ellis LLP](https://cointelegraph.com/news/celsius-changes-legal-team-pays-off-20m-in-aave-debts), the same firm that assisted Voyager Digital [with its bankruptcy filing](https://cointelegraph.com/news/voyager-digital-files-for-chapter-11-bankruptcy-proposes-recovery-plan) last week.

Earlier in the day, Celsius closed off the last of its DeFi debts owed to Compound, Aave, and Maker, reducing its initial debt of $820 million to just $0.013 over the course of a month.

Still unknown, however, will be the fate of depositors who still have their assets locked up on the lending platform. Neither the company nor its CEO Alex Mashinsky has made any public comments about whether depositors will receive any percentage of their funds back.

On Tuesday, Vermont’s Department of Financial Regulation (DFR) [issued](https://dfr.vermont.gov/consumer-alert/dfr-encourages-celsius-network-investors-proceed-caution) a warning against the troubled crypto lending firm, reminding consumers that the firm is not licensed to offer its services in the state.

The DFR also stated it believed the company was “deeply insolvent” and doesn’t possess “assets and liquidity” to fulfill its obligations toward the customers, and accused them of mismanaging customer funds by allocating them towards risky investments.

***Related: [Bombshell allegations of fraud as KeyFi takes Celsius to court](https://cointelegraph.com/news/bombshell-allegations-of-fraud-as-keyfi-takes-celsius-to-court)***

Vermont has become the sixth state in America to open an investigation into Celsius’s crypto interest rate accounts, joining the likes of Alabama, Kentucky, New Jersey, Texas and Washington.

Rumors of Celsius’ insolvency began circulating last month after the crypto lender was forced to halt withdrawals due to “extreme market conditions” on June 13.

title: NFT 空投是利好吗？怎么操作？
body:
本文为NFTGO研究院作品，点此看[英文原文](https://nftgo.io/research/How-Is-the-Market-Reacting-to-NFT-Airdrops+vE9kDHbhYqoXT3EYCoWn-inVF2miOKjJpaedI7C0uG8)

由 [@BTCdayu](https://twitter.com/BTCdayu) 转译为中文

## 关键要点

* 在空投发生之前，主要收藏品会提高底价。这通常发生在几天前或宣布空投时。
* 辅助集合与主集合的性能相关。
* 投资者对空投的评估与他们各自的收藏类似。这是因为他们共享完全相同的路线图、团队和社区。
* 一旦空投被释放，投资者就会受到对未来效用的猜测的驱使。

近几个月来，空投变得很流行。在二次收藏被铸造后，新的实用程序被提供给持有者。这些实用程序差异很大，具体取决于给定的集合。它们通常包括但不限于化身、能力和标记。我们发现，在空投发生后不久，这些收藏品的持有者数量显着增加。

## 市场反应

市场对空投的反应对于每个系列都是独一无二的。反应通常由构建团队的质量、社区的质量、持有鲸鱼的数量以及交易者用来评估收藏品的各种其他指标等因素决定。这些其他指标以及上述指标都可以在[NFTGo.io](http://nftgo.io/)上找到。

### BAYC 生态系统

Bored Ape Yacht Club 是 Blue-Chip NFT 以及新系列进入该领域的黄金标准。BAYC 社区为其持有者提供了最多的空投，很明显，这是他们继续在 NFT 市场上如此强大的一个重要原因。每次空投时，初级收藏（BAYC）的持有者数量一直在增加。

![BAYC，持有者趋势：鲸鱼被定义为 NFT 持有价值超过 1,000,000 美元的投资者/持有者。（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cNxkGNr4Vv9FgS6DQtr-Y.png?height=386&width=1133)

Otherside 系列为 BAYC 和 MAYC 带来了历史性数量的鲸鱼。空投前几天，有近 600 头鲸鱼在 BAYC。记录的鲸鱼数量与 BAYC 的历史底价相关，将底价推高至 150 ETH。

根据持有者趋势，底价上涨与空投之间存在很强的相关性。

![无聊猿游艇俱乐部生态系统（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MgQASHaBQg7DLINbC-lgR.png?height=2160&width=3840)

但是，重要的是要注意市场在空投发生后不久就会迅速自我纠正。此外，随着主要收藏的成熟，我们看到长期持有者的增加，通常成为最主要的持有期。

![BAYC，持有期趋势（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/vjEhgUGq7NX1dDOeqc9Ub.png?height=440&width=1280)

### 克隆 X 生态系统

Clone X 在一个月内完成了所有空投。尽管它们早期下降，但它们仍在吸引新的持有者和新的鲸鱼。

![Clone X，持有者趋势（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/iF2IpqHgAyjI2V5jsxjaF.png?height=427&width=1280)

Clone X 和 RTFKT MNLTH 都看到空投的底价上涨。虽然 Clone X 的价值增长比 MNLTH 大得多，但此后不久也出现了更显着的修正。

![Clone X 生态系统（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/mTruSu9-zFuZg6z-RgH03.png?height=2160&width=3840)

### Azuki 生态系统

Azuki 团队是该领域最杰出的团队之一。他们通过创建自己的智能合约来创新智能合约，使用户能够降低他们的 gas 费用并以几乎与铸币 1 相同的成本铸币多个 NFT。

尽管涉及 Azuki 的一位创始人的丑闻，但持有者趋势并没有太大变化。然而，投资该项目的鲸鱼因此下降了 13%。

就其对空投的反应而言，我们看到在第一次空投后鲸鱼数量持续增加，然后在第二次空投到来时蓝筹股持有者大幅增加。（我们的蓝筹持有者指标是新的，所以我们没有关于第一次空投的数据。）

![Azuki，持有者趋势（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MpJxmpJDXwyAPcK_2WGNJ.png?height=411&width=1198)

当他们的第一次空投到达时，Azuki 的底价飙升。然后由于他们的大丑闻，地板价格急剧下降。然而，当他们宣布他们的第二次空投时，我们看到了轻微的增加。就空投如何影响底价而言，第二个数字应该持保留态度，因为我们在这里看到的主要是由丑闻引起的。如果我们关注第一次下跌，我们可以看到它们会对项目的底价产生重大影响。在查看这样的图表时，将新闻考虑在内也很重要。

![Azuki 生态系统（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_xeVT2o9ug_You3ZCIFYT.png?height=2160&width=3840)

## 并非每次空投都能顺利进行

虽然一些蓝筹股在空投方面做得很好，但情况并非总是如此。重要的是要了解在分析集合的数据时需要考虑许多不同的指标。仅仅因为宣布了空投并不意味着它总是会帮助一个项目。

Karafuru 的空投对主要收藏没有催化剂，甚至在空投前几天也没有。值得注意的是，此时整个市场经历了巨大的低迷，因此空投无法帮助他们的事实可能与恶劣的市场条件有关。

![Karafuru 生态系统（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ybeq7PZ8gC2UeauBArxA6.png?height=2160&width=3840)

一旦未公开的 Gachapon 系列触及二级市场，它就会从 0.41 ETH 大幅上涨至 0.78 ETH。此后不久，抛售压力开始出现，超过 80 只鲸鱼卖出了该系列中的 1 个或多个 NFT。

![Karafuru Gachapon（未公开）（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8-DkKaFf0XNFir48srttC.png?height=548&width=1280)

另一方面，从 Gachapon 透露的 NFT 与未透露的相比反映了“实际底价”。由于市场现在知道 NFT 特征，底价下降是很常见的，主要影响包含共同特征的 NFT。不过值得一提的是，由于投资者了解二级收藏品的特点，最稀有的作品开始以当时的底价约 3 倍的价格成交。

![Karafuru Gachapon（已公开）（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WspFE8Hb7kDztooD4h4Vz.png?height=529&width=1280)

与 Karafurus 空投相反，Moonbirds 在空投前后一直保持稳定。

![Moonbirds 生态系统（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/5O0nxK-JlfFiNaieCPJ6T.png?height=2160&width=3840)

与 Karafurus 类似，Moonbirds Oddities 曾在二级市场上大放异彩。奇怪的事情还没有透露，这就是为什么过去几周价格保持不变的原因。

![Moonbirds Oddities（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3CVbXNbWIKrBuYkUMhWrO.png?height=412&width=981)

## 空投在主要收藏品方面的价值

信不信由你，空投从未超过主收藏价值的 50%。

![无聊猿游艇俱乐部，收藏价值（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/q1otuXwmLlTTAHnladFdV.png?height=490&width=883)

![克隆 X，收藏价值（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/92RMtbi8mK6uAB0ltXzyV.png?height=493&width=892)

![Azuki，收藏价值（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xcHm_ywaQHvhwN3PkEEfA.png?height=506&width=887)

在上面的示例中，我们可以看到 Clone X 生态系统几乎接近主收藏总价值的 50% 大关，在该组中最高。

主要收藏品仍然推动着生态系统的表现。空投的价值低于主要 NFT 收藏的 50% 就表明了这一点。

## 预计空投

一旦团队宣布即将进行的空投，收藏的数量就会立即开始飙升。看看 Murakami Flowers，一旦该组织宣布，底价在数小时内从约 2.5 ETH 升至约 5.0 ETH，然后在 3.9 ETH 附近找到了盘整点。

![Murakami.Flowers，价格（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/loAPJL275quwP772fQIFW.png?height=523&width=1280)

投机推动投资者抬高价格。Sartoshi 为 mfers 社区提供了“下一个时代”的日期和时间。细节未披露，但投资者受到预期的驱使，这导致底价上涨 1 ETH。

![Mfers，价格（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/sdrzYodf5zMcphbZEc5_L.png?height=512&width=1280)

## 空投指数表现

NFT 在过去 30 天中损失了近 50% 的美元价值。另一方面，空投指数（ETH）从 6 月份的下跌中恢复得比美元更快，从底部上涨了近 45%。如下图所示，一旦交易者和投资者认识到市场状态，他们倾向于以“ETH 价值”进行交易，从而形成以太坊的积累阶段。

![空投指数最近 30 天（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/OeLW4f1Ny-jsZfsvOQy-3.png?height=436&width=782)

虽然从大局来看，BAYC 生态系统最古老的集合在 ETH 方面在 2022 年表现良好，BAKC 和 MAYC 分别增长了 40% 和 45%。然而，BAYC 土地是 2022 年贬值幅度最大的资产，美元贬值 94%，ETH 贬值 85%。

![2022 年空投表现：BAYC 生态系统（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9Jtbimn_13TCKv7lR544L.png?height=434&width=777)

目前克隆 X 空投在 2022 年的 ETH 价值表现最好：MNLTH 增长 12.43%，Space Pod 增长 214.11%，PodX 是唯一一个从年初到 2022 年 6 月 21 日下降 62.41%。

![2022 年空投表现：Clone X 生态系统（来源：NFTGo.io）](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/EG34xVVhhxkvAFCDZQzNZ.png?height=441&width=808)

考虑到每个蓝筹项目的主要空投集合，除了 Cool Pets ($ETH) 从 2022 年的高点上涨了 8% 之外，所有这些项目的美元和 ETH 价值都损失了至少 25%。

Dooplicator 是其大部分价值下降的收藏品。它从 ATH 暴跌了 95%。但是，上图中提到的空投没有考虑空投奖励（例如 MAYC 持有者的 MAYC Land）。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UxCVAZNfaYIsoYS_7eG0T.png?height=440&width=787)

## 结论

空投可以被视为 NFT 集合生态系统的催化剂。尽管如此，随着炒作开始消退，并且由于没有直接的效用，价格开始调整。抛售压力开始是因为许多人想从“免费空投”中获利。这些方案并不适用于所有集合。有些人会成功空投，但有些人不会在价格中看到反映。

值得注意的是，主收藏与NFT空投收藏之间的市场表现存在相关性。由于两个项目共享相同的路线图，投资者根据相似的指标对它们进行定价：社区、路线图、团队、实用程序等。

也许项目应该首先关注建立一个由真正的信徒（包括鲸鱼）组成的强大社区。否则，一旦确认空投，人们就会开始倾倒他们的行李。

此外，当一个项目即将向其社区发布空投时，值得考虑以下问题：

1. 艺术作品与主要收藏品相似吗？
2. 团队为生态系统增加了多少供应？
3. 团队筹集了多少资金，这笔钱将如何帮助团队实现目标？
4. 目前主要收藏中有多少 OG 持有者？
5. 辅助集合是否添加到实用程序？

## Posted on \*date blocked (fourth post)

Leah holds the tote bag open as I dump my dirty clothes inside. I inhale the fresh laundry smell of the clothes I'm wearing, that Leah had brought me from home, and I'm glad to be checking out of the hospital. I say goodbye to the nurses and walk out into the busy streets of downtown.

I don't feel like going home. It's morning and the day is alive. Leah and I walk south down Yonge Street, the smell of Lake Ontario creeping closer. Reaching the harbor, the smell is overpowered by the fragrance of smoking meats from an outdoor food festival. We tread down a boardwalk, reaching the end, and then continue down Lakeshore Boulevard to a small grassy park along the arm of a peninsula. Strolling down the paved path, our faces are dampened by the mist from waves smashing against flat boulders lining the shore.

"He was so real to me," I say.

"The mind…is a powerful thing," says Leah.

“But the message from Rachel.”

“Rachel?”

“In the writing,” I say. Was she really still out there, I thought, oblivious to everything?

Leah rubs my arm.

"I don't remember writing any of it."

"My psychiatrist thinks my…anxiety was caused by a repressed memory," says Leah. "He says it's a common thing to forget what your mind doesn't want to remember. He...he thinks I was molested in my childhood. I told him I wasn't, and he just said I was…repressing the memory and prescribed more...more pills. The mind is a powerful thing..."

*Childhood*. I repeat the words in my head—*childhood—repressed memories.*

Suddenly, I think of my parents. I think of the cottage and the forest, and I recall the dreams that have haunted me since starting the meds. The visions of the dead birch and the clearing hit me like the waves on the boulders beside us. There was a quickening in my blood, much like, I would imagine, a rise in temperature when a life-long sailor feels that he is getting closer to the sea.

"What's wrong?" Leah squeezes my hand.

"I've been dreaming about the forest again."

"The forest?"

"The forest beside Dad's cottage," I say. Leah studies me. "I've never told anyone about that place. Not my doctor, not anyone."

"What…happened there?" she says.

"I was so young," I say, walking slower. "I remember living with my uncle when I was in elementary school, and never talking for years. My uncle and the doctors thought I turned into a mute. One night when I was eating dinner with my uncle, I said something out loud, like 'thank you' or 'uncle', I forgot which. Then he asked me what happened at the cottage. I told him I didn't remember anything. And it was true. I know what happened there, but what I saw—what I felt—only comes to me in snapshots, like a bunch of photos messed up in my brain."

"Where's the cottage?" Leah interrupts.

"Near Sudbury. My uncle owns it now."

"Hey," Leah pulls my arm. "Look at me."

I look at her.

"We have to…go there," she says.

"Where?" I say, knowing the answer but asking anyway.

"To the cottage," she says.

I look out into the lake. "I don't..."

"We're going," she stops walking and faces me. "We're…going there. And whatever happened there, we're going...to leave it there. We're going to leave it there for good."

title: UK court allows lawsuit to be delivered via NFT
body:
According to a Tuesday notice from U.K. law firm Giambrone & Partners, a case [brought](https://www.giambronelaw.com/site/news-articles-press/library/articles/service-nft-crypto-exchanges-recognised-constructive-trustees) by Fabrizio D’Aloia against Binance Holdings, Poloniex, gate.io, OKX, and Bitkub over allegations someone was operating a [fraudulent clone online brokerage](https://cointelegraph.com/magazine/2022/04/08/four-clever-crypto-scams-beware-dubai-otc-trader-amin-rad) has resulted in a legal precedent offering a digital solution to serving someone. On June 24, the judge in the case allowed parties to be served by airdropping NFTs into wallets originally held by D’Aloia but stolen by unnamed individuals.

Until now, Civil Procedure Rules in the U.K. allowed lawsuits to be served by personal services, mail, dropped off at a physical address, or by means of a fax or another type of “electronic communication.” However, using electronic methods to serve someone has usually been in cases where the parties agreed in advance to such th delivery, or a court authorizes it for a “good reason.” According to Giambrone & Partners, these methods have included Instagram direct messages, Facebook messages and a contact form on a website.

“This order is a noteworthy development in the area of service of court documents and a welcome example of a court embracing new technology,” said the law firm. “This judgment paves the way for other victims of cryptoasset fraud to pursue persons unknown who have misappropriated their cryptocurrency in situations where they otherwise would not be able to.”

Demetri Bezaintes, an associate at Giambrone & Partners, [added](https://www.giambronelaw.com/site/news-articles-press/library/articles/giambrone-ground-breaking-judgment-combats-crypto-fraud):

> “I am confident that this latest judgment using NFT service has the potential to show the way to digital service over the blockchain, with all the benefits of immutability and authentication, becoming the usual practice in the future on legal matters related to the digital world \[...\] It is clear that this method of service has a far greater level of success over conventional means of service, such as post, in this sector.”

In addition to the precedent set by serving individuals [via the blockchain](https://cointelegraph.com/blockchain-for-beginners), the court said crypto exchanges were responsible for ensuring the stolen assets were not moved or withdrawn.

***Related: [Class action lawsuit claims Solana’s SOL is an unregistered security](https://cointelegraph.com/news/class-action-lawsuit-claims-solana-s-sol-is-an-unregistered-security)***

A judge in the United Kingdom has authorized a party in a lawsuit to serve legal documents using nonfungible tokens, or NFTs.

In June, a law firm in the United States also [served a defendant using an NFT](https://cointelegraph.com/news/anonymous-hacker-served-with-restraining-order-via-nft) in an $8-million hacking case involving Liechtenstein-based cryptocurrency exchange LCX. The legal team airdropped the NFT as a temporary restraining order into a hot wallet when the name of the served party was unknown.
