title: 记录LUNA ATH时的决策
body:
> 本文记录于2022年3月30日

今天LUNA已到ATH，约$107，此时必然面临一个决策：卖，还是不卖？

这个抉择可以参考@DeFi100的「防上头清单」

![防上头专用 via DeFi100](https://s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/secure.notion-static.com/e9f1687e-7ddd-4a91-ba6f-77a54f8e7cc8/Untitled.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAT73L2G45EIPT3X45%2F20220714%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20220714T045611Z&X-Amz-Expires=86400&X-Amz-Signature=c627f0d474790749397bc0e87786adb424a54e97cca30cd2197211f370a7bd36&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&response-content-disposition=filename%20%3D%22Untitled.png%22&x-id=GetObject)

其中的此刻我需要回答的核心问题就是：

1. 为什么投？
2. 什么时候卖？

## 为什么投？

因为看好LUNA/UST体系，项目方一直在做事，扩充LUNA金库（买入BTC），扩展UST的使用场景（接入IBC/Cosmos生态），保证LUNA/UST体系的稳定性，这些动作会反映到LUNA的价格上；

## 什么时候卖？

回答这个问题之前，需要先以下两个问题：

* 想不想卖？

不想，因为还需要LUNA质押博取后续Cosmos生态空投。

* 为什么要卖？

因为需要获取UST做现金保障，但现在除了Kinetic需要UST做Lockdrop之外，还有急需UST的项目么？暂时没有，就没有卖的理由。

此时会有卖的想法，是因为有套利心态，看到了获利机会。

获利来源于低买高卖，那么首先是成本问题，手上LUNA的成本低么，这33 LUNA是从市价1 LUNA = 87.23 UST的LP拆出来的，可以认为是成本价，即时现在以107卖出，收益为23%，是否达到了预期收益？可以审视下自己。

同时，如果有套利心态，那么下面的问题来了：

![灵魂拷问 via DeFi100](https://s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/secure.notion-static.com/54567108-5d9c-4af5-a9e4-7f82a8b41003/Untitled.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=AKIAT73L2G45EIPT3X45%2F20220714%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20220714T045812Z&X-Amz-Expires=86400&X-Amz-Signature=668d6c42bc0a8f7475a446a7e2004a4ef4676cbe33f30bef9288c470ac98fc90&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&response-content-disposition=filename%20%3D%22Untitled.png%22&x-id=GetObject)

这就和当初买入中概时的心态一样，多高算高？多低算低？如果靠预测来做交易决策，那就和赌博没有任何区别。

如果没有完整的交易决策框架，靠主观预测做交易，那就是自己送人头被割。

同时会损失的机会成本：质押收益、空投收益，后续上涨的收益；

因此，在20220330，LUNA价格到达ATH时，要不要卖的问题就有了结论，

1. 买的时候就不是为了获利卖出；
2. 不想卖，也没有急需卖出用U的需求；
3. 控制U本位的套利心态；
4. 避免损失后续机会成本。

以上。

title: On-chain reaction
body:
After putting the proposal on-chain, discussion heated up significantly. From my perspective, there were spirited debates in the Nouns Discord channels & Telegram groups about certain core issues:

1. “What legal + compliance hurdles would an equity investment place on the DAO?”

   This was the first equity investment proposed to the DAO, and I knew that figuring out a legal structure would be a challenge since the DAO doesn’t have a legal entity aside from the one-way Nouns Foundation.
2. “What precedent would it set if we started doing equity deals?”

   I’ll comment on this a bit more later.
3. “Why is Verse a good fit to be supported by Nouns"?”

   This was the question most pertinent to the actual content of the proposal (as opposed to the logistical structure). Opinions here of course vary among different people in the DAO, but I left my personal thoughts in the Discourse post above.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XSbtwhSDtmWypMrhrKstw.jpg?height=1080&width=1920)

These are all valid questions that deserve deep consideration. However, personally, I was a bit disappointed that significant pushback only came after the proposal went on-chain and became immutable. Based on the initial positive Discourse reaction, I had no idea that these questions (specifically #1 & #2) would be such heavy blockers that would cause most voters to either abstain or not vote at all. Structurally, I do think it’s a flaw that the DAO isn’t able to effectively counter proposals or make suggested amendments after a prop goes on-chain. Above all, it was just frustrating that the critical feedback came far too late to make any meaningful changes.

title: 20亿美元估值项目，即将启动激励测试网，抢先体验
body:
大家好我是[雨夜](https://twitter.com/0xrainight) ，专注早期项目交互，不定期发布优质项目的交互教程，欢迎关注我的[推特](https://twitter.com/0xrainight)。

今天介绍的项目是[Sui](https://twitter.com/Mysten_Labs)， **Sui** 是一个无需许可的权益证明（PoS）区块链网络，**解决链上交易速度和安全性问题**，由 4 位前 **Meta** 工程师创立的 Web3 基础设施公司 Mysten Labs [@Mysten_Labs](https://twitter.com/Mysten_Labs) 开发。目前正已20亿美元估值，寻求2亿美元的B轮融资。8月将开通激励测试网，现在抢先体验测试节点的搭建吧。

开始今天的教程之前，需要有一定的前置条件：

一台ubuntu服务器(最好是国外的服务器，问题会少很多)，最低配置如下

* CPUs: 2
* RAM: 8GB
* Storage: 50GB
* OS：Ubuntu 22.04

**1、使用ssh登录服务器（mac、linux系统下操作**）

```
ssh root@服务器ip 
```

回车确认，如果出现提示”Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no/\[fingerprint\])?“

输入 `yes` 回车确认

窗口等待输入服务器密码，回车确认。进入服务器

![运行成功结果](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/OsahNoX6yRpK-syR-EMtb.png?height=43&width=580)

**2、安转docker、docker-compose**

进入服务器后，默认在 \~目录下。创建新目录`sui-node/devnet并进入目录`

```
sudo mkdir -p ~/sui-node/devnet && cd ~/sui-node/devnet
```

![运行成功结果](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/00WNO8B8jdyFYaZJBCI3i.png?height=53&width=496)

安转docker

```shellscript
sudo wget -O get-docker.sh https://get.docker.com &&sudo sh get-docker.sh && sudo rm -f get-docker.sh
```

![运行成功结果](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/brwhoYdXmVxLTu5ZDukQh.png?height=398&width=990)

安装docker-compose

```shellscript
sudo curl -L "https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/1.29.2/docker-compose-$(uname -s)-$(uname -m)" -o /usr/local/bin/docker-compose && sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose
```

![运行成功结果](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Qrd_1h9_powUYEdJRKqyd.png?height=123&width=847)

验证docker、docker-compose

```shellscript
sudo docker -v
sudo docker-compose -v
```

![运行成功结果](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Xky7-SMJ_dfPonN9075m8.png?height=130&width=577)

**3、下载所需配置文件**

```shellscript
sudo wget -O fullnode-template.yaml https://github.com/MystenLabs/sui/raw/main/crates/sui-config/data/fullnode-template.yaml
sudo wget -O genesis.blob https://github.com/MystenLabs/sui-genesis/raw/main/devnet/genesis.blob
sudo wget -O docker-compose.yaml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MystenLabs/sui/main/docker/fullnode/docker-compose.yaml
```

![运行中](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/BMC3kuT16lu4QnDLtkTtS.png?height=562&width=993)

运行完成后，使用 ll 命令查看是否有

docker-compose.yaml  fullnode-template.yaml   genesis.blob 三个文件

![运行成功结果](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jLzBYt7k_3oCmclmbNviH.png?height=153&width=533)

**4、修改配置文件**

```shellscript
sudo sed -i 's/127.0.0.1:9184/0.0.0.0:9184/' fullnode-template.yaml
sudo sed -i 's/127.0.0.1:9000/0.0.0.0:9000/' fullnode-template.yaml
```

运行后使用 cat  fullnode-template.yaml 查看文件信息是否如图

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NznxHawz-w1yeNq-c6P26.png?height=183&width=531)

**5、拉取docker文件**

```shellscript
sudo docker-compose pull
```

![运行中](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/50nXS6OBuShEcEGAgAFpm.png?height=75&width=530)

成功后显示

![运行成功结果](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/OfJ5R0XFGMkocUFcweaAn.png?height=74&width=527)

**6、启动节点服务**

```shellscript
sudo docker-compose up -d
```

![运行成功结果](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/62kwBxuxmSLuiSAAC_MZn.png?height=107&width=584)

**7、测试节点是否启动成功**

```shellscript
curl --location --request POST 'http://127.0.0.1:9000/' \
    --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
    --data-raw '{ "jsonrpc":"2.0", "id":1, "method":"sui_getRecentTransactions", "params":[5] }'
```

![运行成功结果](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PjL0mGkz_kBygcI1sOuWe.png?height=67&width=843)

也可以查看端口是否启用 netstat -ant ，**如果提示没有命令先使用 apt install net-tools 安装**

![运行成功结果](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1gHdsKWBCKwia10qyUYtp.png?height=381&width=545)

**7.1设置防火墙、安全组，放行9000、9184端口**

Google cloud 设置防火墙

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9kQQFA7a1DfTV5UY7pPYP.png?height=954&width=495)

**8、监控节点 访问下发网站**

<https://node.sui.zvalid.com>  红框处输入**你自己的服务器ip**，点击 CONNECT 按钮

![运行成功结果](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/uprV76UOv60kQNSnTElmC.png?height=834&width=2282)

下方出现节点信息说明配置成功

![运行成功结果](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9upZDIkSv9SBj4xF2sp8W.png?height=1594&width=2818)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dRfUEzfSTZQr1ydsMO0Sg.jpg?height=388&width=900)

今年5月17日，Vitalik Buterin在推特上发表了一些在其价值体系中尚未完全解决的矛盾的看法。他认为，其中一个矛盾是对去中心化和民主的热爱与他在许多具体政策问题上倾向于同意“知识精英”而不是“人民”之间的矛盾。

实际上，这个矛盾也体现在了去中心化的DAO加密项目身上。随着加密货币行业继续经历资本和资金的大幅下滑，在LUNA崩盘和3AC清算等大型黑天鹅事件动摇了投资者的信心、市场情绪极度恐惧之后，由社区拥有的、民主的加密货币组织和协议如何在市场中生存下来？

### DAO的概念

DAO指的是去中心化自治组织，简而言之，就是一个没有集中领导的实体。它是一个由其社区成员运营和管理的组织，与传统公司不同，DAO中没有层级结构，也没有CEO 或董事会，其决策完全民主化。

Vitalik Buterin在他以太坊白皮书中设想了如何使用区块链来创建一个具备功能性且去中心化的组织，以及权力和领导权如何能够属于每个人。他认为去中心化组织是“一群人根据代码中指定的协议相互交互，并在区块链上强制执行”，而控制财库的去中心化自治组织是“一个生活在互联网上并自主存在的实体，但也严重依赖雇佣个人来执行自动化本身无法完成的某些任务”。

通常情况下，DAO的运行在几个方面与传统组织不同。例如，大多数DAO都有内置的财库，未经团队批准，任何人都无权访问。这意味着每个人，从开发人员到普通团队成员，都对公司的运营和设计有发言权。理论上来说，DAO的决策是自下而上做出的。然而，现实生活中的DAO治理与这些理想主义的概念却难以相互匹配。例如，在LUNA死亡螺旋崩溃之后，一些在线调查人员声称其创始人Do Kwon偷偷使用秘密钱包来影响投票决定并左右结果。

成员进入DAO有多种模式。基于代币的成员资格通常是最常见的方式。成员资格可以决定DAO 的投票权和其他重要权利和选择。DAO中的决策由提案来管理，而提案需经小组投票批准。对于大多数DAO，持有的代币越多的成员，其投票就越重要。显然，这种会员模式意味着大型代币持有者在批准提案时拥有不成比例的权力和影响力。事实上，一个拥有大量代币的社区成员可以使其他成员的意见无效。在这种情况下，DAO的去中心化程度就会受到质疑。

### 智能合约下的人为治理

世界各地的公司都按照标准的文明原则、法律或社会契约进行运作。在常规组织中，公司的支柱往往是一套法律规则和文件，是所有公司员工都必须遵守的准则。相比之下，DAO的支柱则是智能合约。智能合约是存储在区块链上的计算机编写程序，只要满足特定条件，它就会运行。它们用于自动执行协议，以便所有参与者都可以立即确定结果。智能合约在区块链行业有很多应用，也被用于建立DAO的规则。

DAO的智能合约是防篡改的，并且可以公开访问。因为所有智能合约信息都是公开的，任何用户都无法在无人注意的情况下调整代码。除非经过投票，否则不能更改智能合约。这是理想情况下应该发生的事情。但实际上的DAO有点脆弱，并且代码中的漏洞很容易受到黑客攻击。事实上，历史上第一个DAO仅在创建后三周就因智能合约漏洞被黑客入侵，损失6000万美元。最近，Rari Capital、EasyFi 和 ForceDAO 等 DAO 也都因代码漏洞而被耗尽了资金。

### 熊市中的DAO治理

DAO的去中心化性质带来了独特的机会和问题，它让每个人都有发言权，但这也伴随着大型持币者对协议提案拥有重大影响的风险。尽管DAO是一种以前所未有的方式带来包容性和思想多样性的绝佳工具，但在不确定时期，社区成员的多元化意见和普遍不确定性可能会损害其发展。DAO在资金充沛的牛市可能运行得很好，但在资金枯竭的熊市，流动性将变得很低，许多DAO的治理代币失去了价值，社区成员也遭受了重大损失。在这些压力条件下，DAO治理的情况也被打上了问号。

### Merit Circle和YGG

例如，Merit Circle，这是一个P2E元宇宙游戏协议，旨在赞助和教育对区块链P2E游戏感兴趣的玩家。它通过向玩家们借出其财库中的物品来实现这一点。该协议还旨在通过提供教育内容和赞助奖学金等努力来增加公众对区块链游戏的参与。

Merit Circle由Merit Circle DAO管理，这是一个采用基于代币的会员制DAO，决策是通过MC持有者的投票做出的。Merit Circle在其私募种子轮融资中筹集了450万美元，其重要投资者之一是YGG，它捐赠了175000美元的种子轮捐款，以换取SAFT协议和36个月线性解锁的种子轮的MC代币。SAFT协议是加密货币开发商和合格投资者之间的法律协议，项目方用在未来一段时间内发放加密代币的承诺来换取投资者的资本。

5月20日，在MC代币因市场状况遭受重大打击后，DAO的一名成员起草了一份提案，提议取消YGG的SAFT协议，退还他们的初始投资，并移除其MC种子代币。尽管该提案与Merit Circle与YGG之间的协议背道而驰，同时没有法律依据，而且如果YGG选择追究，将导致长期旷日持久的法律斗争，但该提案以压倒性优势获得通过。

虽然提案的起草者声称通过提案的原因是由于YGG提供的资金“缺乏价值”，并且旨在摆脱“对项目漠不关心的VC”，但值得注意的是，该提案是在初始种子代币解锁即将开始的时候提出的，而且MC代币价值大幅下跌，这使得购买任何VC的种子代币变得更加容易，而不会占用DAO财库的大量资金。

尽管在允许Merit Circle DAO以创纪录的低价收购YGG代币的提案获得通过后，这两个DAO 同意友好拆分，但它提出了一个问题，即DAO治理可能与传统法律发生冲突，以及社区成员可能出于自我利益选择取消与投资者的合同义务。提案起草者本人也表示，YGG也是一个P2E游戏协议，尽管推动了该领域的合作，但它们是“竞争对手”而非合作伙伴。当大多数人的意愿与法律支持的合作协议发生冲突时，谁应该拥有最终决定权？从Merit Circle的案例来说，答案是DAO。

### SOLEND与匿名大户

Solend是一个基于Solana区块链的算法去中心化借贷协议。该协议是一个标准DeFi风险投资，旨在让用户赚取存款利息或借入资产。2022年6月，该协议遭遇重大危机。由于极端的市场条件，Solana代币价值大幅下跌，许多贷款开始接近追加保证金的边缘。由于该协议中最大用户的一笔贷款有可能引发清算浪潮，并可能使协议破产，随着Solana的价格继续下跌，它正不断接近保证金要求。

为解决该问题，协议建立了一个DAO并起草了一份提案，如果获得通过，将授予协议“紧急权力”以暂时接管该大户的账户并在场外清算它，以避免将Solana推向危险的极限。这一决定在加密货币社区中引起了相当大的轰动，让整个事件更具争议的是，这个DAO似乎是因为这个问题而专门创建的。尽管该提案争议性极大，但它还是毫不费力地获得了批准，因为有超过110万票赞成，只有30000票反对。

然而，与Merit Circle不同的是，社区对此提议的观点并不一致。事实上，有超过100万的选票来自持有大量治理代币的单个用户，该用户贡献了100万张选票，即90%的YES选票，而其他数千名用户则强烈反对该提案。如果没有该大户的支持，该议案将无法达到110万票，也绝对不会通过。做出这一决定后，加密社区爆发了强烈抗议，不少业内领袖认为去中心化的平台不应该控制用户的资产。

作为对批评的回应，Solend DAO宣布该提案无效，并提出了第二个改进提案，将投票赞成或反对提案的时间延长到一天，以允许“进一步参与”。在第一天结束之前，可能造成清算风险的大户最终决定从Solend转移资金并平仓，再加上大盘刚好出现反弹的有利市场条件，算是勉强交出了一个令人满意的解决方案。尽管避免了一场危机，但Solend DAO的行动还是使人们对去中心化自治组织是否有能力在少数用户控制大量治理代币的情况下做出合理决策产生了质疑。

这就提出了一个严肃的问题。如果恶意行为者设法积累大量治理代币，起草了一个糟糕的提案，如何可以阻止这种提案？即便协议开发人员可以从技术上进行阻止，但他们是否有权利这样做呢？这也是目前DAO治理难以解决的问题。

### 小结

区块链行业是一个不断创新和发展的领域，而DAO是人们迄今为止的最具颠覆性组织和最成功的大规模尝试。自2020年以来，随着Defi的兴起，DAO迅速流行起来。但是，从本质上讲，目前存在的大多数DAO都没有真正经历过熊市的考验。随着经济大环境的压力，加密市场继续下跌，各加密项目正在继续失去收入以及流动性，这些无结构的DAO将如何应对和驾驭糟糕的市场条件，将成为一个非常值得关注的行业问题。

\*此处表达的观点和意见作者的观点和意見，不一定反映SparkDAO的觀點。每一項投資和交易都涉及風險，在做出決策時，你應該有自己的判斷！

title: How 'over-financialisation' of crypto lead to the rise and fall of the industry. And how we can build it back again...
body:
As a long time evangelist and supporter of blockchain technology and various crypto projects, I have a confession to make. Over the years, I have grown a certain level of ‘dislike’ for Bitcoin. The problem is, I don’t actually find it very useful at all. That being said, I must give it credit where it is due - the boom of Bitcoin provided a meaningful experiment that validated the secure nature of blockchains.

Now time for confession two…. While I am fan, Ethereum isn’t really that useful either. Sure, we can build complex applications on-top of blockchains but unfortunately those applications are bound to the restrictions of a blockchain environment and are unable to communicate with any meaningful data other than what the Ethereum protocol provides out of the box.

Cue… DeFi

* Decentralised liquidity provision
* Decentralised lending protocols
* Tokenised, immutable in-game assets

While I do think that these are innovative financial products, they are largely built on top of tokens that are mostly backed by questionable value. They missing one key element that makes them actually valuable. External data.

Without the ability to reference external data in a trustless manner, blockchain technology is incapable of facilitating any kind of useful transaction that impacts the real world. This is the difference between “money legos” and “money Jenga”.

With that all said, I should be clear that I am still extremely bullish on crypto technologies.

I see the current state of crypto is similar to the state of computing in the 80’s (coming from a zoomer…). I say this because pre-1993, the internet was not yet popularised. Computers did not have the ability to seamlessly connect and share information with other devices. AKA; the ability to connect to external data.

I strongly believe that blockchain technology running in parallel with a standardised oracle network (likely Chainlink) to fetch and validate external data is a recipe to disrupt global financial industry at scale.

This ‘magic recipe’ provides cost savings for corporations globally by applying automation to highly sensitive and trust heavy industries that would otherwise require expensive auditing and risk/security control.

* Insurance
* Trusted automated banking infrastructure
* Transparency to FED data
* Trust minimised enterprise systems
* Supply chain; RFID tracking, IOT sensors
* E-signatures
* Identity protocols
* Biometrics data

The next magic internet money printing machine will not survive. Let’s build positive-sum applications that offer a product/service that generates value for BOTH users AND investors - because Chainlink makes this possible.

I know… crazy idea right?

If you’re building something truely useful in the blockchain ecosystem, I would love to hear your story and learn about your product. Don’t be afraid to reach out to me on Twitter or Telegram @fintechfin

title: Mint information, Community, And the start of an era. 🧙
body:
Firstly, thank you all for the amazing support for the upcoming Mint.

The amazing fan art, heart-wrenching stories and all the funny memes you have sent us have truly humbled us!

We wanted to be transparent and keep you all updated before our official launch, so here is a small blog post about our upcoming Mint!:

Community is one of our core philosophies, and we would be nowhere without everyone's support, so listening to feedback is always the number priority.

So after hearing a lot of complaints and worrisome messages about the overallocation, and how it brings additional stress and gas wars, we have concluded that we will change our Mint allocation!

We had originally decided upon a 20% overallocation to guarantee a Mint-out of the WL and to account for the industry average of 25% no-shows.

However, as the community, you have made it very clear to us that you want to Mint, and we expect the no-show quota to be far less than originally anticipated!

So seeing your loyal support and the great community we were able to build so far, we felt that it was unfair to have such a high overallocation and have thus decided to lower the overallocation!

After consulting with our advisors and the gracious support of our collab partners, who were willing to sacrifice their originally intended allowance, we have increased the total WL supply by an additional 12.51% to reward our early supporters!

Our new WL supply will be **5000**, and our new WL overallocation will only be **7.49% !**

Despite the new overallocation rate, we can’t guarantee everyone to be able to Mint a wizard, and we suggest all summoners Mint their Wizard as soon as possible, so to not miss out!

The Mint will take place exclusively on [www.wickedwizard.wtf](http://wickedwizard.wtf/) and public minters will also be able to Mint directly via the smart-contract in addition to the website.

We are over the moon about everyone's support and can't wait for everyone to meet their wizards!

Furthermore we have received feedback that the Mint details were a bit unclear, so we reworked our Mint timeline to showcase a clearer timeline for the Mint!

Below is this reworked, easier-to-view timeline to convey our launch schedule better!

title: Funding ideology & Nouns as a neutral ecosystem
body:
Regarding the long-term implications of the DAO undertaking equity investments, a few Nouners made some points which I respect and understand where they’re coming from. Going down the path of equity funding - as opposed to strictly funding projects without a direct expectation of return - firmly places the DAO in the same territories as VCs and traditional funds. And that path is marked by increased legal liabilities and regulatory scrutiny that could significantly affect the way the DAO operates. To me, these concerns are valid and should be carefully considered.

At the same time, I do want to highlight my disagreements with some other arguments made against this proposal, specifically relating to the ideological values of Nouns.

1. **Contractual equity agreements dilute the nounishness of a proposal**

   I think this argument is orthogonal to the core premise of the Nouns virtuous cycle: drive attention back to the meme. To me, it doesn’t make sense to eschew potential equity partnerships under the pretense that the DAO should never seek direct upside from funding projects. In my opinion, if the goal is to drive attention & value back to the Nouns brand, there shouldn’t be mutual exclusivity between accruing value via brand exposure & accruing value via contractual revenue flow. Both routes increase the size of the treasury and enable the meme to further propagate.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hyVhFdvvtkqyLdLkPBtpL.jpg?height=1200&width=1920)

1. **Nouns should fund projects which it is uniquely capable of supporting**

   As Nouns grows, the validity of this argument diminishes. If Nouns indeed becomes a massively valuable, permissionless brand, the most ambitious projects which approach the DAO for funding will have no shortage of potential funders who realize the value and are more inclined to fund the project & experience the upside. For example, it’s easy to imagine a scenario where Pharrell approached the DAO about funding a song about Nouns. It wouldn’t make sense for the DAO to walk away from this proposal just because he could also readily get the funds necessary from any sufficiently interested record label.
2. **Nouns should be a neutral ecosystem, and shouldn’t take profit-driven stakes in projects**

   I found this argument to be the strongest and most compelling, because it gets at the heart of Nouns strongly resembling Ethereum itself; a credibly neutral ecosystem in which anyone can build. It’s not hard to imagine a future where NounsDAO operates similar to the Ethereum foundation, providing grants to projects that build in the ecosystem. Extending this possibility, it’s also not hard to imagine venture funds spinning up Nouns-specific arms - just like many traditional VC funds have done admist the growth of Ethereum - and doing equity deals with companies that are building on top of Nouns.

   At the same time, I do think it’s important to recognize the nuances here. A big part of the Nouns virtuous cycle mechanism is building up the treasury, which continues to accrue funds at a rapid rate. In a world where Nouns becomes more Ethereum-like and turns into more of a public utility than a brand, it’s also likely that many ambitious projects will turn to venture funding over DAO funding, as the former will be cheaper/more readily available to access & will arguably offer the project more tailored resources to succeed. In this case, if the social value of the treasury depreciates, it seems logical that the DAO would want to extend the value of Noun ownership to not only governing the treasury, but governing projects & protocols that are built on top of Nouns. And what is the most straightforward way to gain these governance rights? To become early investors in these projects & protocols, via an equity/token structure. In the long-run, I think it’s inevitable that the DAO seeks more ownership in the projects that are built in the Nouns ecosystem. I’m not saying that will necessarily come in the form of traditional equity, but it’ll be structured in the form of profit-driven stakes nonetheless.

title: Mint information, Community, And the start of an era. 🧙
body:
Firstly, thank you all for the amazing support for the upcoming Mint.

The amazing fan art, heart-wrenching stories and all the funny memes you have sent us have truly humbled us!

We wanted to be transparent and keep you all updated before our official launch, so here is a small blog post about our upcoming Mint!:

Community is one of our core philosophies, and we would be nowhere without everyone's support, so listening to feedback is always the number one priority.

So after hearing a lot of complaints and worrisome messages about the overallocation, and how it brings additional stress and gas wars, we have concluded that we will change our Mint allocation!

We had originally decided upon a 20% overallocation to guarantee a Mint-out of the WL and to account for the industry average of 25% no-shows.

However, as the community, you have made it very clear to us that you want to Mint, and we expect the no-show quota to be far less than originally anticipated!

So seeing your loyal support and the great community we were able to build so far, we felt that it was unfair to have such a high overallocation and have thus decided to lower the overallocation!

After consulting with our advisors and the gracious support of our collab partners, who were willing to sacrifice their originally intended allowance, we have increased the total WL supply by an additional 12.51% to reward our early supporters!

Our new WL supply will be **5000**, and our new WL overallocation will only be **7.49% !**

Despite the new overallocation rate, we can’t guarantee everyone to be able to Mint a Wizard, and we suggest all summoners Mint their Wizard as soon as possible, so to not miss out!

The Mint will take place exclusively on [www.wickedwizard.wtf](http://wickedwizard.wtf/) and public minters will also be able to Mint directly via the smart-contract in addition to the website.

We are over the moon about everyone's support and can't wait for everyone to meet their wizards!

Furthermore we have received feedback that the Mint details were a bit unclear, so we reworked our Mint timeline to showcase a clearer timeline for the Mint!

Below is this reworked, easier-to-view timeline to convey our launch schedule better!

## Revamped Mint Details:

### Phase 1 : Whitelist Mint ✨

5000 Supply

Mint Price = Free

Allocation: 1x WL

title: Mint information, Community, And the start of an era. 🧙
body:
Firstly, thank you all for the amazing support for the upcoming Mint.

The amazing fan art, heart-wrenching stories and all the funny memes you have sent us have truly humbled us!

We wanted to be transparent and keep you all updated before our official launch, so here is a small blog post about our upcoming Mint!:

Community is one of our core philosophies, and we would be nowhere without everyone's support, so listening to feedback is always the number one priority.

So after hearing a lot of complaints and worrisome messages about the overallocation, and how it brings additional stress and gas wars, we have concluded that we will change our Mint allocation!

We had originally decided upon a 20% overallocation to guarantee a Mint-out of the WL and to account for the industry average of 25% no-shows.

However, as the community, you have made it very clear to us that you want to Mint, and we expect the no-show quota to be far less than originally anticipated!

So seeing your loyal support and the great community we were able to build so far, we felt that it was unfair to have such a high overallocation and have thus decided to lower the overallocation!

After consulting with our advisors and the gracious support of our collab partners, who were willing to sacrifice their originally intended allowance, we have increased the total WL supply by an additional 12.51% to reward our early supporters!

Our new WL supply will be **5000**, and our new WL overallocation will only be **7.49% !**

Despite the new overallocation rate, we can’t guarantee everyone to be able to Mint a wizard, and we suggest all summoners Mint their Wizard as soon as possible, so to not miss out!

The Mint will take place exclusively on [www.wickedwizard.wtf](http://wickedwizard.wtf/) and public minters will also be able to Mint directly via the smart-contract in addition to the website.

We are over the moon about everyone's support and can't wait for everyone to meet their wizards!

Furthermore we have received feedback that the Mint details were a bit unclear, so we reworked our Mint timeline to showcase a clearer timeline for the Mint!

Below is this reworked, easier-to-view timeline to convey our launch schedule better!

5000 Supply

title: 复盘三箭崩盘事件，如何引发加密行业连锁反应？
body:
就在比特币跌破 40,000 美元的前几天，也就是三箭资本破产前两个月，Su Zhu 在巴哈马坐下来接受采访，他光着一只脚悠闲地在腿下晃动。作为拥有十年历史的加密货币行业的传奇投资者，他传达的信息与他轻松的举止相匹配。 “当市场出现很多绝望情绪时，你可以开始购买加密货币，”他在 FTX 交易所的播客录音中面无表情地说。 “你不必被市场的绝望情绪所支配。”

加密玩家喜欢将错词“HODL”描述为永不出售的口头禅，这种钢铁般的乐观情绪在他们身上随处可见。但 Su Zhu 不仅仅是一个激光眼的加密货币交易员。他和他的同学 Kyle Davies 一起经营着三箭资本，这是世界上最大的加密货币对冲基金之一，管理着数十亿美元，虽然按照华尔街的标准，这个资金体量远非庞大。但在数字资产方面，它是重量级的。

不仅如此，Su Zhu 和 Davies 都是加密市场中有影响力的人，共有 610,000 名 Twitter 追随者。三箭资本是一些知名的加密初创公司的风险投资者，在某些情况下，他们既是大型贷方的借款人，又是其中一些贷方的股东，甚至三箭资本是其他新兴基金的母公司。

Su Zhu 在 2018 年底首次成名，他正确地判断了上一个“加密冬天”的结束，比特币的价格下跌了约 80%。因此，当比特币从今年超过 68,000 美元的峰值下跌时，利率上升导致投资者快速逃离风险资产，但 Su Zhu 仍然保持乐观，并认为依靠借来的现金，三箭资本押注的加密货币会反弹。相反，市场一直在下沉，多米诺骨牌接二连三地倒下，直到压倒了基金这张最大的多米诺骨牌。6 月中旬，三箭资本开始错过为其交易头寸追加保证金的通知，并于 7 月 1 日宣布破产，因为比特币的交易价格低于 20,000 美元。

title: Konami Reinstating Delisted Metal Gear Games For Series' 35th Anniversary
body:
Konami is preparing to reinstate the Metal Gear games it temporarily removed from sale as the series celebrates its 35th anniversary.

As reported by [VGC](https://www.videogameschronicle.com/news/on-metal-gears-35th-anniversary-konami-says-its-preparing-to-bring-back-delisted-games/), Konami's Japanese Twitter account posted to commemorate the anniversary and announced that fans, seemingly soon, will once again be able to play [the temporarily suspended entries](https://www.ign.com/articles/metal-gear-solid-games-removed-from-sale-temporary).

"The Metal Gear series, released on July 13, 1987, celebrated its 35th anniversary today," it said. "We are preparing to resume sales of titles that have been temporarily suspended."

This could refer to the versions of Metal Gear Solid 2 and 3 that were removed from digital storefronts last November following license renewal issues.

title: 2022 Disney Accelerator
body:
Today, The Walt Disney Company announced the six companies that will be joining the 2022 Disney Accelerator, a business development program designed to accelerate the growth of innovative companies from around the world. This year’s Disney Accelerator class is focused on building the future of immersive experiences and specializes in technologies such as augmented reality (AR), non-fungible tokens (NFTs), and artificial intelligence (AI) characters.

The Disney Accelerator kicks off this week, connecting the 2022 class with the creativity, imagination, and expertise of Disney. Over the course of the program, each participant company will receive guidance from Disney’s senior leadership team, as well as a dedicated executive mentor. The Disney Accelerator program will conclude with a Demo Day in the fall at the Walt Disney Studios lot in Burbank, Calif.

title: Executing on our long-term vision
body:
n the two years leading up to this milestone, we’ve celebrated some incredible moments along the way…

* December 2019: [Launched Checkov](https://bridgecrew.io/blog/announcing-checkov-prevent-cloud-misconfigurations-during-build-time/), our open-source IaC scanner with initial support for Terraform
* April 2020: [Came out of stealth](https://bridgecrew.io/blog/the-crew-is-out-of-stealth/), releasing our codified cloud security platform and [ten+ ecosystem integrations](https://bridgecrew.io/blog/developer-first-integrations-codified-cloud-security-platform-launch/)
* April 2020: [Open-sourced AirIAM](https://bridgecrew.io/blog/airiam-open-source-aws-iam-terraform-right-size-launch/), our IAM right-sizing tool for AWS
* May 2020: Built [TerraGoat](https://bridgecrew.io/blog/terragoat-open-source-infrastructure-code-security-training-project-terraform/), our vulnerable-by-design training tool for Terraform, later followed by [CfnGoat](https://bridgecrew.io/blog/introducing-cfngoat-a-vulnerable-by-design-cloudformation-training-tool/) and [CDKGoat](https://github.com/bridgecrewio/cdkgoat)
* July 2020: Checkov [passed 1k stars on GitHub](https://twitter.com/bridgecrewio/status/1282717861195034624?s=20) (it now has over 2k)
* December 2020: [Launched Code Reviews](https://bridgecrew.io/blog/code-reviews-actionable-iac-security-feedback/) feature to provide relevant changes on commits and CI/CD runs
* February 2021: [Entered agreement to be acquired by Palo Alto Networks](https://bridgecrew.io/blog/palo-alto-networks-announces-intent-to-acquire-bridgecrew/) as part of Prisma Cloud

Each of these moments and everything in between has contributed to our success. And in many ways, today’s milestone is simply another along our continued journey. By [becoming part of Palo Alto Networks’ Prisma Cloud](https://blog.paloaltonetworks.com/2021/03/bridgecrew-developer-led-security/), we get to continue bridging the gap between developers and cloud security. **This is what this acquisition means for our open-source community, the Bridgecrew platform, and the cloud security ecosystem at large.**

Tl;dr:

* Checkov is not only here to stay but will benefit from even more resources to expand the depth and breadth of its coverage.
* We will continue investing in our other open-source projects like our vulnerable-by-design training tools and AirIAM. We also have some exciting new open-source projects in the works to solve other infrastructure development challenges. (Subscribe to our blog 👉  for updates)
* We will double-down on adding features, integrations, and improvements to the Bridgecrew platform.
* Soon, Bridgecrew customers will benefit from many code and cloud security features available in Prisma Cloud.
* Together, Bridgecrew and Prisma Cloud will be the first to secure the entire cloud-native development lifecycle for security and engineering teams alike.

## Doubling-down on support for the community

[Checkov](https://checkov.io/) has been downloaded over 1.2M times and has received over 2,000 stars on GitHub. When we open-sourced Checkov just over a year ago, we only had an inkling that the need for it was so great and that the response would be so resounding.

We are keeping the commitment we made then—to make IaC scanning easy and accessible to all. With the help of the community’s feedback and contributions, we’ve learned that to do so, it needs to be comprehensive in both breadth and depth. That means more built-in checks across more supported frameworks. It also means going deeper into the areas we already support and making the feedback even more valuable.

We take great pride in our open-source commitment and will continue developing our existing projects with exciting plans for new ones.

* We open-sourced AirIAM after identifying access and identity as the ultimate trust boundary being disrupted by IaC. AirIAM creates an immutable snapshot of IAM directories and creates rightsized instances of them. We look forward to introducing additional Terraforming and rightsizing capabilities in the coming months to continue elevating free and accessible IAM security.
* We were inspired by previous “vulnerable-by-design” projects to help developers experience what misconfigured infrastructure looks like without compromising their existing apps. We remain committed to helping DevOps leaders educate the broader developer ecosystem on the risks of human error in cloud infrastructure.
* We are in the final phases of development of a new automated infrastructure tagging tool. (If you’d like to hear more about it and participate in an early private beta, drop me a line.)

## Bringing developer-first cloud security to all with Bridgecrew

Launched less than a year ago, the [Bridgecrew SaaS platform](https://bridgecrew.io/platform) combines IaC scanning powered by Checkov with runtime security capabilities. We decided early on to make surfaced feedback actionable and accessible in the form of security-as-code fixes, available in our free Community plan. We will continue to offer our free Community plan and accessible pricing options. 

Our bread-and-butter is surfacing misconfigurations in IaC as part of pre-commit hooks, code reviews, and CI/CD runs. While IaC continues to be a core focus, our customers will still have complete access to our runtime scanning and automated remediations. This capability is crucial to bridge the divide between code and cloud. It enables us to cover core cloud security use cases like drift detection, blast radius estimation, and more.

One of the things we’re most excited about is the ability to quickly integrate features that are less core to our focus on infrastructure and IaC. As part of the Prisma Cloud family, we get to tap into the market’s leading cloud security solution. Many of its capabilities, like static code analysis and vulnerability scanning in Docker images, will be added to the Bridgecrew platform over time. This is a huge benefit to teams using the Bridgecrew platform to shift cloud security left. 

## Executing on our long-term vision

Ultimately, we are thrilled at the prospect of developing the first end-to-end security platform for both developers and security teams that covers the entire application lifecycle. 

With our focus on IaC and the developer experience, along with [Prisma’s incredibly robust cloud native security platform (CNSP) capabilities](https://www.paloaltonetworks.com/prisma/cloud), we’re excited about what we can achieve together. 

When combined, our complementary technologies and approaches will disrupt how teams have addressed cloud and application security. Together we look forward to securing our digital lives and saving teams valuable time and resources along the way. 

As the legendary Vulcan philosopher Surak said, “May we together become greater than the sum of both of us.” 

## · · ·

To learn more about what the acquisition means for us, [ask us anything in our Reddit AMA](https://www.reddit.com/r/AMA/) Thursday 3/4 at 8 am PT. Bridgecrew co-founder and CEO Idan Tendler is also joining Varun Badhwar, SVP Products & Engineering, Prisma Cloud, [for a Fireside Chat on 3/8](https://www.twitch.tv/bridgecrewio/schedule)!

title: 在加密熊市，创业公司该如何度过难关？
body:
*撰写：Imran*

*编译：TechFlow intern*

在今天的环境下，加密货币创始人在融资时应该怎么做？在过去两周里，我与40多位创始人交谈过，以下是我给他们的反馈：

### **保持冷静和自信**

投资者可能不会给你一个明确的答案，如果没有回复，也不要让这种情况动摇你的信心。你的团队现在比以往任何时候都更需要你，你必须相信你自己和你带给市场的产品。

### **生存**

生存是所有问题的重中之重，直到你的产品适应市场。请记住**Aave, Compound, dYdX, Uniswap等都是在熊市中建立的**。

* 1.按原计划结束你的投资回合
* 2.申请补助金--2.5亿美元可用
* 3.在条款/估值方面要灵活

### **产品市场契合度**

对于创始人来说，他们需要影响力，那么就需要对PMF（产品市场契合度）和用户牵引力进行优化，以建立杠杆。如果你没有得到你想要的牵引力，那么就迅速调整，直到你拥有良好的PMF。

### **定价估值**

过去18个月，创始人以高估值在不同的市场上筹集资金。不要攀比或竞争，专注于生存，并以能给你带来发展空间为条件进行融资。以下是我们看到的估值：

**预种子轮：300万-900万美元**

**种子轮：1000万-1500万美元**

### **精打细算**

在我见过的加密货币初创公司中，最常见的开支是招聘速度过快和参加/赞助活动。@eladgil在他的“High Growth Handbook”一书中讨论了只有在领导该职能/角色的人处于能力过剩状态时才选择招聘。

### **建立一个紧密的关系网络**

在与许多创始人交谈后——我很幸运地遇到了@__mikareyes，她已经建立了一个强大的、职能相似的创始人群体。如果您是希望获得支持的创始人或投资者，请与她联系。

title: A Retro Memoir from Steam Gamers Back in 2003
body:
During the past week, P12 reached multiple milestones in the **Genesis Airdrop Event**. But without the support of our beloved gamers and developers, we would never have come this far.

**We reached out to some gamers ranked within the top 50, hoping to do a short interview about their gaming history.** We are lucky and honored to have some kind response from our interviewees. We are here to share it:


---

## Intro

Today's content came from 3 Chinese steam gamers, all ranked in the top 50 among all 500k users verified on the P12 platform. China is a large gamer community with over 30 million steam users and 380+ local games published.


---

## The Origins

We started the interview by asking ***"How did you got into steam, what was the first game you played on steam?"***.

Surprisingly, we received 3 similar answers from the interviewees. ***"It was because of Counter-Strike 1.6"***.

> *"I started playing back in CS 1.3, I did not even know Steam was a gaming platform back then. All I knew was if I wanted to play CS 1.6, I would have to download and register on Steam."*
>
> From: GT_Marksman

Other interviewees shared the same information. Their initial contact with Steam was because of *Counter-Strike: 1.6*. They all remained loyal players of *Counter-Strike: Global Offensive* ever since it came online in August 2012.


---

## The Favourite

As we all know, most gamers are wide open to trying any type of game, especially in the early stage of their gaming history. Our interviewees were no different, they were the **early pioneers of many timeless classics**:

> *"I tried many other games as well, like Dota and Dota 2, I played them for many years. But ever since my gamer friends got busy dealing with life and marriage, we stopped spending too much time on those games. In my current stage of life, 10 minutes death match in CS:GO is probably the only thing that works for me, I get to enjoy, without devoting too much time."*
>
> From: GT_Marksman

> *"My favorite game type is FPS game, but I also play a lot of MMORPG and ARPG. I would say Worldofwarcraft is my second favorite game, I devoted a lot of time to it."*
>
> From: VortX


---

## From web2 to web3

Many gamers heard about ***gamefi*** and ***web3***, more or less. Same with our interviewees, all three of them knew gamefi to some degree, and some even hold a crypto investment portfolio.

***"So how much do they know about web3 and gamefi, representing first-gen gamers, do they have any advice for P12?"***

> *“I actually do know about blockchain, matter of fact: my crypto portfolio is in a net loss right now… I really hope web3 and gamefi can focus on the nature of play rather than earning. Blockchain technology should only be implemented when we have matured and quality game in place. Fun-to-play is really a must, players have to be willing to spend, before they all think about how to earn. Otherwise, a death spiral is inevitable.”*
>
> From: GT_Marksman

> *“I had heard about ‘Play-2-Earn’ before, and I did try some. However, it was a really bad experience for me as a web2 gamer... For me, web3 or p2e games are not fun at all, including but not limited to the visual effects/network stability/interactive play. I don't really think true gamers will play these games, at least not for now.”*
>
> From: iang X

It is obvious that **web3 games need some major make-over in order to get web2 audience**.


---

## The expectation

P12 values users' feedback. We definitely love taking suggestions and expectations as well.

The conversation, therefore, goes to the next topic: ***"What types of games you'd like to see on the P12 platform in the future?"***

> *My personal preference would be FPS games with MMO traits. Like ‘The Division’ or ‘Destiny 2’, where gamers can participate in the design of DLC and spend time treasure hunting. In my opinion, this will better attract ‘p2e‘ players in the web2 space.*
>
> From: VortX


---

## Wrapping-up

Our interviewees today represent the first generation of Steam gamers back in 2003, who should already be in a later stage of life where work, family, and obligation kick in.

Loss of time, busy at work and family. Gamers in that era may not enjoy gaming like they used to, but **the spirits live on, and they will still love gaming just like on day 1**.

To all our gamers out there, when was the last time you were "**Online**"?

title: dilute the nounishness of a proposal
body:
Nouners made some points which I respect and understand where they’re coming from. Going down the path of equity funding - as opposed to strictly funding projects without a direct expectation of return - firmly places the DAO in the same territories as VCs and traditional funds. And that path is marked by increased legal liabilities and regulatory scrutiny that could significantly affect the way the DAO operates. To me, these concerns are valid and should be carefully considered.

At the same time, I do want to highlight my disagreements with some other arguments made against this proposal, specifically relating to the ideological values of Nouns.

1. **Contractual equity agreements dilute the nounishness of a proposal**

   I think this argument is orthogonal to the core premise of the Nouns virtuous cycle: drive attention back to the meme. To me, it doesn’t make sense to eschew potential equity partnerships under the pretense that the DAO should never seek direct upside from funding projects. In my opinion, if the goal is to drive attention & value back to the Nouns brand, there shouldn’t be mutual exclusivity between accruing value via brand exposure & accruing value via contractual revenue flow. Both routes increase the size of the treasury and enable the meme to further propagate.
2. **Nouns should fund projects which it is uniquely capable of supporting**

   As Nouns grows, the validity of this argument diminishes. If Nouns indeed becomes a massively valuable, permissionless brand, the most ambitious projects which approach the DAO for funding will have no shortage of potential funders who realize the value and are more inclined to fund the project & experience the upside. For example, it’s easy to imagine a scenario where Pharrell approached the DAO about funding a song about Nouns. It wouldn’t make sense for the DAO to walk away from this proposal just because he could also readily get the funds necessary from any sufficiently interested record label.
3. **Nouns should be a neutral ecosystem, and shouldn’t take profit-driven stakes in projects**

   I found this argument to be the strongest and most compelling, because it gets at the heart of Nouns strongly resembling Ethereum itself; a credibly neutral ecosystem in which anyone can build. It’s not hard to imagine a future where NounsDAO operates similar to the Ethereum foundation, providing grants to projects that build in the ecosystem. Extending this possibility, it’s also not hard to imagine venture funds spinning up Nouns-specific arms - just like many traditional VC funds have done admist the growth of Ethereum - and doing equity deals with companies that are building on top of Nouns.

   At the same time, I do think it’s important to recognize the nuances here. A big part of the Nouns virtuous cycle mechanism is building up the treasury, which continues to accrue funds at a rapid rate. In a world where Nouns becomes more Ethereum-like and turns into more of a public utility than a brand, it’s also likely that many ambitious projects will turn to venture funding over DAO funding, as the former will be cheaper/more readily available to access & will arguably offer the project more tailored resources to succeed. In this case, if the social value of the treasury depreciates, it seems logical that the DAO would want to extend the value of Noun ownership to not only governing the treasury, but governing projects & protocols that are built on top of Nouns. And what is the most straightforward way to gain these governance rights? To become early investors in these projects & protocols, via an equity/token structure. In the long-run, I think it’s inevitable that the DAO seeks more ownership in the projects that are built in the Nouns ecosystem. I’m not saying that will necessarily come in the form of traditional equity, but it’ll be structured in the form of profit-driven stakes nonetheless.

title: TikTok announces new ways to filter out mature or 'potentially problematic' videos
body:
TikTok on Wednesday announced several [updates](https://newsroom.tiktok.com/en-us/more-ways-for-our-community-to-enjoy-what-they-love) intended to help users customize their viewing preferences and filter out content that may be problematic or too mature for young users, amid renewed scrutiny of the potential harms social media poses to teens.

The short-form video app is tweaking its viewing experience so users will now see fewer videos about topics that "may be fine as a single video but potentially problematic if viewed repeatedly," according to Cormac Keenan, head of trust and safety at the company. Keenan cited topics related to dieting, extreme fitness, and sadness as examples of such content. (TikTok rival Instagram has also [previously attempted](https://www.cnn.com/2019/09/19/business/instagram-posts-cosmetic-surgery-diet-products-trnd/index.html) to prevent teens from seeing certain weight loss products.)

[An FCC regulator wants TikTok removed from app stores. Here's how a company executive responded](https://edition.cnn.com/2022/07/03/media/tiktok-reliable-sources/index.html)

TikTok also said it is rolling out a new system that organizes content based on thematic maturity, not unlike the ratings systems used in film and television. The new safeguards will allocate a "maturity score" to videos detected as potentially containing mature or complex themes.

* 

The goal, according to Keenan, is "to help prevent content with overtly mature themes from reaching audiences between ages 13-17."

* 

Senators [grilled executives from](https://www.cnn.com/2021/10/26/tech/tiktok-youtube-snap-hearing/index.html) TikTok, YouTube, and Snap late last year about the steps their platforms were taking to protect teens online after a Facebook whistleblower renewed concerns about the impact social media platforms have on their youngest users.

### 在哪里寻找加倍的机会

寻找空投一方面是消遣，另一方面是现代 degen 的链上工作。目前，Web3 的前沿领域是可以找到有效获得「加倍」空投的最佳潜在机会。**我的意思是，执行一项交互以符合两个不同项目未来 Token 空投的条件。**要找到这些机会，请从这里开始：

**找到一个尚未发行 Token 的有前途的以太坊 Layer2——或者就 Optimism 而言，该项目计划在未来进行多个阶段的 Token 空投。**

在这些 Layer2 上查找和使用尚未发行原生 Token 的应用程序。**请记住，此策略并非万无一失。它可能会导致你错过尝试仍未发行自己原生 Token 的 Layer2 或 Dapps！**

在蓬勃发展的 Layer2 生态系统生命周期的早期，将会有不少「双份」空投发生。找准自己的定位。因此，如果你感兴趣，请考虑在候选 Layer2 上尝试一些无 Token 的 Dapps，这样如果这些项目+rollup 中的任何一个最终向早期用户空投了原生 Token，你就会成为这些用户中的一员。

至于具体有哪些 Layer2 目标：Optimism、zkSync 和 Arbitrum 似乎是唾手可得的果实。

例如，我们已经知道 Optimism 正在继续进行多轮 OP Token 空投，并且 zkSync 项目已经[确认了自己的 Token 计划](https://docs.zksync.io/userdocs/faq/#will-there-be-a-token)。Arbitrum 的团队一直对 Token 讨论保持沉默，但似乎已经准备好发行 Token 以进行社区协作。

这让我们不得不挑选目前可以在这些 Layer2 上使用的无 Token 的特定应用程序。我将通过向你展示一些符合该要求的项目来帮助你切入正题……

### 首先，跨链桥

有许多以 Layer2 为中心的跨链桥项目尚未推出 Token。

今年早些时候，Hop 推出了其 Token HOP。很可能在未来几个月内，多个跨链桥会进行追溯性空投，以保持流动性。一些最终可能会发行自己的 Token 的跨链桥包括：

[Bungee](https://bungee.exchange/)：支持 Arbitrum、Optimism 和其他 EVM L1；

[deBridge](http://app.debridge.finance/)：支持 Arbitrum 和其他 EVM L1；

[Mosaic by Composable Finance](https://mosaic.composable.finance/)：支持 Arbitrum 和其他 EVM L1；

[Orbiter Finance](https://www.orbiter.finance/)：支持 zkSync、Arbitrum、Optimism 和其他 EVM L1；

[LI.FI 的 transferto.xzy](http://transferto.xyz/)：支持 Arbitrum、Optimism 和其他 EVM L1。

其中一些项目，如 Orbiter Finance，可能尚未经过全面审计，因此请谨慎使用。

然而，这些跨链桥目前提供了一些最明显的潜在「双倍」空投候选人。

### 其他没有发币的 Layer2 项目

除了跨链桥之外，你还可以尝试一些 Layer2 上尚未发币的 DeFi、NFT 和钱包项目：Argent

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6BjKzheJe61JqQX0Ce0iz.png?height=765&width=1277)

Argent是一款支持以太坊和 zkSync Layer2 的移动社交恢复钱包。在 zkSync 网络，Argent 基于 Aave、Lido 和 Yearn 协议提供了 Layer2 DeFi 投资机会。Argent 通过一系列的集成或许将为你提供获得 zkSync Token 的机会。

**潜在策略：**

使用 Argent 在 zkSync 上通过 Aave 借出 DAI 或 USDC；

使用 Argent 在 zkSync 上通过 Lido 质押 ETH ；

使用 Argent 在 zkSync 上将 ETH、DAI、USDC 或 WBTC 投资到 Yearn 协议。

#### Cozy

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1uOV4ZPVStCo2utfpxTmO.png?height=400&width=719)

#### Cozy Finance是一个开源的、类保险的协议，允许人们创建自动化的 DeFi 保护市场。

今年早些时候，该项目增加了对 Arbitrum 的支持，并且仍然是无 Token 的。在 Cozy 上提供流动性、借贷或投资，你或许可以获得 COZY + ARBI Token 的机会，这是一种可能性。

**潜在策略：**

在 Cozy 上使用 [Protected Investing](https://app.cozy.finance/protected-invest) 功能；

在 Cozy 上存入资金提供[保护](https://app.cozy.finance/provide)；

在 Cozy 上[借钱](https://app.cozy.finance/get-protection)。（注意：Cozy 不适用于美国用户。）

#### DeFi Saver

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ff4RA_575aVOhh8ZBi6OT.png?height=360&width=721)

[DeFi Saver](https://defisaver.com/)是一个不错的 DeFi 管理平台，就像个人的链上控制中心。

该项目甚至可以让你模拟流行的 DeFi 操作，因此你可以了解交易背后的运作方式。今年早些时候，该项目推出了对 Arbitrum 和 Optimism 的支持，虽然其团队没有表示计划向其 Layer2 用户空投 Token，但这种可能性仍然存在。

**潜在策略：**

在 Arbitrum 或 Optimism 上[通过 DeFi Saver](https://app.defisaver.com/exchange)进行交易；

在 Arbitrum 或 Optimism 上使用 DeFi Saver 上的[Aave 集成](https://app.defisaver.com/aave/manage)。

#### Quixotic

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Wkn_Wz8aNEXDrLZPGJyfJ.png?height=443&width=723)

[Quixotic](https://quixotic.io/)目前是 Optimism 上最大的 NFT 交易市场。

或许有一天它会选择像其他 NFT 市场一样推出一种 Token，例如 SuperRare 的 RARE。因此，在平台上买卖 NFT 可能会帮助你「加倍」获得 Quixotic Token（如果真的发生的话）以及第二阶段的 OP 空投。

**潜在策略：**

在 Quixotic 上购买 NFT；

在 Quixotic 上出售 NFT。

#### Yield 协议

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/yBB89KO2J79PXO8f_eN7n.png?height=700&width=725)

[Yield Protocol](http://app.yieldprotocol.com/)是一种固定利率借贷协议，于 2022 年 3 月激活了对 Arbitrum 的支持。

该项目的 FAQ 有这样阐述：「从长远来看，我们希望 Yield 协议由社区拥有」，因此看起来发行 Token 的确定性较高。该 Token 是否会在 Arbitrum 或 Ethereum 上实现还有待观察，但无论如何，Yield Protocol 是一个值得关注的项目。

**潜在策略：**

在 Arbitrum 上通过 Yield Protocol [贷款](https://app.yieldprotocol.com/lend)；

在 Arbitrum 上通过 Yield Protocol [借款](https://app.yieldprotocol.com/borrow)；

在 Arbitrum 上为 Yield Protocol [提供流动性](https://app.yieldprotocol.com/pool)。

 
 结论

**简单来说，找到可能执行追溯性空投的 Layer2，在这些 Layer2 上使用很酷的尚未发币的 Dapp——然后坐下来等待。**

当然，事情可能并不总是那么简单——例如，你可能必须参与更广泛的项目，例如[The Arbitrum Odyssey ](https://metaversal.banklesshq.com/p/arbitrum-odyssey-begins-)（目前已暂停）以锁定 Token 分配。

**这是一种低风险、为熊市而准备的投机策略**，你现在可以继续前进。但是有很多事情我们不知道：潜在的 Layer2 Token 分发将如何运作，或者哪些项目将推出 Token 经济学等。

不过，我们确定是，大多数 Layer2 可能都会推出 Token。这些 Layer2 上的一些 Dapp 也可能会推出自己的 Token。

因此，为这些潜在的「加倍」空投机会定位一个简单的方法是尝试尽可能多的候选项目，然后等待未来某一天的谜底揭晓。

title: 164期社区例会|解析NFT生成艺术“贩卖机”Art Blocks
body:
本期例会主题：解析NFT生成艺术“贩卖机”Art Blocks

Art Blocks (中文名: 艺术街区) 诞生于 2020 年11月27日，由生成艺术家 Erick Snowfro 创办并在该平台发行了第一个生成艺术系列 Chromie Squiggle。

简单来说就是一个艺术品发售平台，它的官网并没有二级市场，所以在发售之后，藏家需要去 OpenSea 的二级市场进行交易。

Art Blocks 共分三个类别，分别为「策展项目（Curated Projects）」、「艺术家游乐场（Artist Playground）」以及「工厂（Factory）」。

策展项目（Curated Projects）

在这一分类中的作品均为通过 Art Blocks 官方审核的项目，一般而言是质量最有保证的项目。

艺术家游乐场（Artist Playground）

这一分类中的艺术家均为曾发行过策展项目的艺术家，而在这一分类中，艺术家们的作品无需经历项目方严苛的审核，可以随心所欲地创作，因此被称为「游乐场」，一些艺术家会在此尝试颇具实验性的艺术项目，这里也成为了他们的「实验室」。

工厂（Factory）

这一分类中的艺术家无需有发行过 Art Blocks 策展项目的经历，因此艺术作品的水准较为参差不齐，有较为平庸的作品，但也有策展项目的遗珠，因此在挑选时需要仔细选择、做好研究。

与头像类 NFT 不同，艺术品的稀缺性永远是不可忽略的因素。Bored Ape 等头像类 NFT 的初始社区共识往往取决于 NFT 的数量，数量稍多一些往往意味着社区共识更加强大。但 Art Blocks 的共识取决于整个项目而非单一的艺术系列，虽然不同系列的细分共识会有区别，但 Art Blocks 的整体共识来源于所有系列共识的凝聚。有了这个保障，稀缺性便不会对共识产生影响，而只会提升艺术品的价值。

目前，Art Blocks团队拥有2名主要成员：平台创始人Erick Calderon及首席创意总监Jeff Davis。

作为Art Blocks的创始人和首席执行官，Erick Calderon是加密艺术世界中颇受尊敬的人物。
Erick Calderon在2017年成为CryptoPunks的收藏者，成为最重要的“Punk老炮儿”之一。他于2020年11月推出了Art Blocks。
他是由传统领域转到NFT领域，之前是做瓷砖生意。
Erick Calderon推文主页：<https://twitter.com/ArtOnBlockchain>

作为Art Blocks首席创意总监，Jeff Davis拥有多年艺术绘画领域的工作经验，其个人作品曾在美国托兰斯艺术博物馆、萨克拉门托的当代艺术中心等多地进行展出。他不仅是一位传统的艺术家，同时也是一位数字生成艺术创作者。
Jeff Davis推文主页：<https://twitter.com/jeffgdavis>

Art Blocks平台对上架项目收取10%的费用， 10% 将转移到 Art Blocks 地址，余额立即转移到项目创建者。  

目前为止，融资三轮

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PTuBaChBlV9xa4ozcgM0u.png?height=429&width=1095)

这个平台及其发行的项目在去年蛮火的，引起一阵艺术生成潮流，有几个爆火的系列，我发进来大家看看。感兴趣的也可以去opensea搜一下，艺术性很高。

该项目是创始人snowfro的作品，2020年11月推出，也是平台上的第一个作品，当时售出的固定价格是0.035e，现在也是平台的logo。

如何在Art Block 购买NFT艺术品呢？

**1.打开并登入 [https://](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//artblocks.io)[artblocks.io](https://www.artblocks.io/)**

打开官网，链接 Metamask。支持的钱包包括MetaMask、WalletConnect、Gnosis 和 Argent。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Gkg9203elNLU_bmlW3IVw.png?height=237&width=612)

二、购买

Art Blocks通过直接连接Metamask钱包进行交易。

作为Art Blocks平台唯一指定的二手交易市场平台，买家也可以通过OpenSea实现已铸造NFT的二手交易。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ghy3xC0Jvrt2pf73AkAg-.png?height=291&width=612)

保证钱包中的资产可以支付 NFT。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rpZbsjrpOeijAoQPlwL6M.png?height=296&width=612)

**创作流程和申请标准 
 **
创作指南：<https://docs.artblocks.io/creator-docs/creator-onboarding/readme/>

申请标准：
Art Block按时间顺序浏览提交的作品，优先考虑带有原型的应用程序。每周处理大约 20 份申请。

项目提交后，将通过两次筛选。

第一次筛选确定作品是否被平台接受。该筛选由 Art Blocks 的工作人员和生成艺术专家组成的筛选委员会进行。评选的重点是整体美学、mint的多样性，以及项目在技术、视觉和概念上探索新领域的程度。

第二次筛选适用于接受在 Art Blocks 上启动的项目，由一个由国际艺术界成员组成的指定策展委员会完成。策展委员会将决定是否将项目作为 Art Blocks Curated 发布。选中的项目是那些向收藏家展示最高水平的技术熟练程度、创新、多样性和具有长期价值的项目。Art Blocks官方会从申请项目中筛选出部分安排策展。只有入选Curated的项目才会进入官方藏品名单。

title: SpruceID早期交互教程，融资4000万美元交互较复杂
body:
创作不易希望多多转推点赞便是对我的鼓励与支持，务必关注推特定会让你收获更多。

[https://twitter.com/maik2hello](https://twitter.com/maik2hello)

SpruceD 由顶级加密风投公司A16Z牵头先后完成两轮融资近4000万美元，为用户可移植声誉所需的身份验证、凭证和存储提供支持，提供对数据的分散访问控制以及 Web2 API 和 Web3 之间的互操作性以及用于身份识别的尖端隐私和可用性技术，简单的说属于DID身份认证基础构架系统，未来在Web3中不可或缺的底层身份识别系统框架，不仅提供身份认证识别同时为底层存储提供支持。

**像这种做基础构架系统的项目，得到顶级风投青睐的大笔融资，即使你不懂得项目本身的发展前景，也应该引起足够的重视，但凡能参与的机会尽量不要错过，其他的不多说，要是有兴趣的可以自己找资料研究一下，在这里不再对项目本身做过多的阐述。其本身的交互过程稍微比较繁复，复杂一点。我们下面对其整个绑定交互过程做详细操作说明。其复杂的操作过程会挡住一些人，这便是机会。**

首先通过chrom下载扩展程序应用钱包“Temple-Tezos wallet”,下载钱包扩展应用不要嫌麻烦，很简单几分钟就搞定钱包，没用过也不要紧，以后大概率能用到此钱包，未雨绸缪总是好事

[https://chrome.google.com/webstore/category/extensions?hl=zh-CN](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/category/extensions?hl=zh-CN)

然后进入如下网址开始绑定交互：

[https://tzprofiles.com/connect](https://tzprofiles.com/connect)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3Ntd6YopBGxdzTVreVtJY.png?height=577&width=1182)

**第一项资料绑定认证**：像如下方式填写即可，注意;网址链接填写自己的推特地址就可以，图片地址填写推特资料图片地址就可以,然后点击“submit”提交完成第一项

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8EKLoaays2qCKHUAta30C.png?height=600&width=1183)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fMwiiTGX0VqDd_qOVPZS0.png?height=492&width=604)

**第二项推特认证**：第1步填写推特用户名去掉@，第2步点击确认签名钱包批准签署，第3步转推，第4步复制转推链接张贴最后，完成。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oq7gEjolXlFDRryiycW-2.png?height=611&width=1201)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oUYP4EhY7xU7E9vAbd7RF.png?height=608&width=1043)

**第三项绑定ETH钱包**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/b9U7OUO0Qzm0q072SvsrD.png?height=586&width=1176)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3MdTjrwiNyUdgcDRshnaq.png?height=584&width=1151)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/lICI_dwmXV8yAaNNPokUQ.png?height=608&width=1152)

第四项discord绑定认证：需要进入官方discord指定频道输入签署文件证明

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KeKF_nbNz4azAgD7tAg7c.png?height=595&width=1189)

通过1，2步完成discord绑定

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7ej5pehr2wDyC6_1lbXPq.png?height=618&width=1035)

然后通过3步，复制签署文件证明，点击第4步“here”进入官方discord“#verification”频道提交刚才复制的信息张贴频道中，完成。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/HeFlaxDXD0dAsjdbHbMSY.png?height=599&width=1127)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WVPQvI-pjkgN7AzDQsFQU.png?height=546&width=962)

title: a protocol that can support shared pending orders
body:
The decentralized NFT trading protocol is to NFT Market what AMM is to DEX.

The core needs in NFT trading are liquidity and price, so the real moat of NFT exchanges should be built on the liquidity and price advantage of commodities when they are sold.

The aggregator that changes the pattern only solves the problem of scattered NFT pending orders as a front-end traffic portal, and does not fundamentally solve the liquidity problem.

The most likely solution to the liquidity monopoly is not the next exchange or aggregator, but a protocol that can support shared pending orders, thereby breaking the boundaries between NFT tool platforms and NFT exchanges, so that every traffic front end can become a trading platform And share its pending orders to form a decentralized NFT trading ecosystem, and solve the problems of dispersion and liquidity of NFT pending orders.

title: Microsoft Releases Fix for Zero-Day Flaw in July 2022 Security Patch Rollout
body:
Microsoft released its monthly round of Patch Tuesday updates to address [84 new security flaws](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/releaseNote/2022-Jul) spanning multiple product categories, counting a zero-day vulnerability that's under active attack in the wild.

Of the 84 shortcomings, four are rated Critical, and 80 are rated Important in severity. Also separately resolved by the tech giant are [two other bugs](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-relnotes-security) in the Chromium-based Edge browser, one of which plugs another [zero-day flaw](https://thehackernews.com/2022/07/update-google-chrome-browser-to-patch.html) that Google disclosed as being actively exploited in real-world attacks.

Top of the list of this month's updates is [CVE-2022-22047](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2022-22047) (CVSS score: 7.8), a case of privilege escalation in the Windows Client Server Runtime Subsystem ([CSRSS](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Client/Server_Runtime_Subsystem)) that could be abused by an attacker to gain SYSTEM permissions.

"With this level of access, the attackers are able to disable local services such as Endpoint Detection and Security tools," Kev Breen, director of cyber threat research at Immersive Labs, told The Hacker News. "With SYSTEM access they can also deploy tools like Mimikatz which can be used to recover even more admin and domain level accounts, spreading the threat quickly."

Very little is known about the nature and scale of the attacks other than an "Exploitation Detected" assessment from Microsoft. The company's Threat Intelligence Center (MSTIC) and Security Response Center (MSRC) have been credited with reporting the flaw.

title: 生活中很任性的良言句子，经典至极，引人共鸣！
body:
一、再烫手的水还是会凉，再饱满的热情还是会退散，再爱的人或许会离开，因此你要乖要长大，不再张口就是来日方长，而要习惯人走茶凉。

二、人最原始的天性赤裸裸地呈现在你面前，你看到的时候不由得感到恐惧，因为你看到的是自己。

三、买得起自己喜欢的东西，去得了自己想去的地方，不会因为身边人的来或走损失生活的质量，反而会因为花自己的钱，来得更有底气一些，这就是应该努力的原因。

四、你之所以一边埋怨自己，一边又安于现状，是因为你还没走到无路可走的时候。真正的选择，是别无选择！

五、生活总是喜欢逗弄我们。在你绝望时，闪一点希望的火花给你看，惹得你不能死心；在你平静时，又会冷不丁地颠你一下，让你不能太顺心。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/slleXGSXnJmCvZnRQIXnG.jpeg?height=323&width=494)

六、如果有一天，让你心动的再也感动不了你，让你愤怒的再也激怒不了你，让你悲伤的再也不能让你流泪，你便知道这时光，这生活给了你什么，你为了成长，付出了什么。

七、不解释的，才叫从容。不执着的，才叫看破。不完美的，才叫人生。用心甘情愿的态度，过随遇而安的生活，你在，世界就在。

八、有时候看错人，不是因为你瞎，而是因为你善良。有时候爱错人，不是因为你蠢，而是因为你专一。不是因为你错了，所以你不够好。你犯下的错，都是因为你太好。

九、有钱，把事做好！没钱，把人做好！蛇不知道自己有毒，人不知道自己有错。你的好，对别人来说就像一颗糖，吃了就没了。而你的不好，就像一道伤疤，会永远存在。这就是人性！

十、一个人最好的生活状态是，爱的时候不辜负自己的心，玩的时候不辜负路边的风景，睡觉的时候不辜负温暖的床，一个人的时候不辜负自己。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/lQlw2rdYmjrX9Tp1uH8Pu.jpeg?height=319&width=490)

十一、无论什么时候，你都需要给自己一个明确的底线，因为很多时候，有些人他会一点一点磨消你的底线，当你没有底线的时候，你就完全被别人控制。

十二、内心强大的人，方能容纳情绪的不安、浮躁、焦虑，他处理任何事、做任何决定，都有着自己的节奏和思考，他亦不惧与人分享，你在他的脸上，看不到慌张，只有坚定与平静。——摩西奶奶《人生永远没有太晚的开始》

十三、随着年龄的增长，现在考虑多的不是感情和婚姻，而是如何追寻自我，追寻某些人生的意义和重点，比如自由，比如孤独，比如慈悲。——《不过，一场生活》

十四、总会有一个人让你伤心，总会有一段情教会你转身。面对放在心里的人和无可奈何的感情，我们要做的并非坚持到底，而是适时放手。

十五、性格写在脸上；人品刻在眼里；生活方式显现在身材；情绪起伏表露于声音；家教看站姿；审美看衣服；层次看鞋子；投不投缘，吃一顿饭就能知道。你只要有足够的阅历，其实，人是可以貌相的。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nkrcy3e6-SodqvCtym2XX.jpeg?height=306&width=491)

十六、别依赖，没有免费的肩膀；别退缩，落井下石的人很多；别低头，地上没有黄金。世界很大，无需钻牛角尖，挤不进的世界，不要硬挤，换个角度，你会更有作为。

十七、人生最重要的不是已经失去的，也不是尚未得到的，而是此刻拥有的。过去无法挽回，明天还是未知，只有当下是实实在在的。

十八、常有人叫你退一步，退一步等困难过去了再说，于是你往后退，当你退到能看到全局的地步，除了去适应它，你已经来不及做任何改变了。所以别退，千万扛住，扛到最后，要么你强大了，要么困难就真的过去了。

十九、你明知道蜷缩在床上感觉更温暖，但还是一早就起床；你明知道什么都不做比较轻松，但依旧选择追逐梦想。这就是生活，你必须坚持下去。

二十、人生中，你要知是非以不辩为解脱，烦恼以忍辱为智慧，办事以尽力为有功，处人以真诚为品格。做人的方略是：把好自己的口，明了心中的事，干好手里的活，走好自己的路。

二一、越是忙碌，就越是要小心生活的鸡零狗碎，不要被无谓的人事消耗，不要在生活的泥潭里打滚，要时刻清楚什么才是对自己最重要的事，谁才是对自己重要的人。保持专注，保持警惕，时间用在哪里，人生就在哪里。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dRaldk54_bBEVEZrPselS.jpeg?height=357&width=485)

title: 正确地认识交易(三）- 在什么市场更容易赚钱？
body:
## 外汇 A股 美股 商品期货 数字货币 - 选什么市场进行交易？

在不同的交易市场上活跃着不同的交易者，特别是个人交易者，由于时间精力的限制，往往只能选择其中一个交易市场进行交易。 针对这些交易市场的区别有两种大相径庭的观点：

1. 交易的本质都相同，只要策略正确，选任何市场交易都可以赚钱
2. 选择合适的市场很重要，你看美国十年牛市，A股是十年三千点，所以一定要先选择容易赚钱的市场

![中美股市十年（2010-2020）的涨幅对比](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FIy9dVMVrcvp6P3Z2G-gS.png?height=238&width=500)

 
 

本文会从博弈论的角度阐述如何看待不同的市场，可以让您在合适的时间选择合适的市场进行交易。

## 零和博弈（Zero-sum game) 和 非零和博弈

有一个前置知识需要讲解：

**零和博弈（*Zero*-*sum game*)**：零和博弈意思是所有博弈方的利益之和为零或一个常数，即一方有收入，其他方必有所失。

**非零和博弈（Non-z*ero*-*sum game*)**：非零和博弈意思是各博弈方的得益之和是不确定的变量。

所有金融市场衍射品比如**期货、期权就是零和博弈的市场**。比如期货市场中空头的盈利来之于多头的损失。比如下图中的有AB玩家，可看出：A的亏损就等于B的利润，反之亦然。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/QFpNrSZXg0vP7Yop4vv3L.png?height=647&width=778)

 
 

而**股票市场是非零和博弈的市场**，有时候所有参与者都可以赚钱，或者都可以亏钱。如下图的AB两个玩家。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jsNZOWMXGgeTcA8zfHKyR.png?height=578&width=616)

股市的牛市就因为股市中大部分股票都在上涨，大多数参与者都都在赚钱。而熊市就是大多数人都在亏钱。

## 外汇 A股 美股 期货 数字货币，你的选择是什么？

如果能够从博弈论的角度理解市场，那么合适的选择就是：首选 **处于牛市周期的市场**，其次可以考虑 **任何衍生品市场**，不应该选择 **处于熊市周期的市场**。

结合现在的时间段，在2022年07月份，A股明显就是比美股和数字货币更好选择。而应该要避免在美股和数字货币市场进行交易。

title: 不要因为1/4的浑浊而放弃3/4的清澈
body:
俞敏洪讲过这样一个故事：他用矿泉水瓶装了一瓶黄河水放在路边上，一个小时后，他吃惊的发现，本来浑浊的黄河水3/4已经变成了清澈的水，1/4才是沉积下来的泥沙。假如把清澈的水比喻成幸福和快乐，把沉淀的泥沙比喻成痛苦，当你摇晃这瓶水，你的生命中就充满了浑浊，也就是充满了痛苦和烦恼。但当把心静下来后，尽管泥沙总的分量一点都没有减少，但是它沉淀在你的心中。因为你的心比较沉静，所以不会被搅和起来，因此你生命中的3/4就一定是幸福和快乐。

**所以，请不要因为四分之一的浑浊而放弃四分之三的清澈。** 
 

如何保持清澈？这是值得我们不断思考的人生选题。 
 

**人情世故要看透，赤子之心不可无。**康辉曾在节目中分享自己的看法：我们可以接受自己在成长的过程中慢慢地不再天真了，但我们往往讨厌自己在成长的过程中变得越来越世故。在这个世界上，我们可能随着年龄的增长，你会看到复杂的世界和社会，你看到的不再是黑白，也会看到很多灰色，你会看尽世间百态，但如果经历这些之后，你仍然能够在心中有一份相信，眼睛里保有那一份清澈，这就是真正的成熟。世故的人的眼睛会变得越来越浑浊，因为他所有做事情的出发点都是趋利避害，慢慢地眼睛就会变得浑浊，心中也就丧失了对这个世界那些美好的感知能力，慢慢地变得不再有同理心，不会去关注别人。希望所有人都可以相信这个世界上有永恒不变的美好和纯真。 
 

**保持清澈的前提是良善**，一个邪恶的人很难想象他的眼神能真正的澄澈。当然，仅有一片赤诚定是不够的，你要心怀纯良、心怀豁达。纯良可以令你用初心去望这繁浊的尘世，豁达可以让你用乐观的境界看世间百态。每个人的人生里都会遇到一场措手不及的大雨，若你身陷雨中，愿有人为你撑伞；如果没有，也愿你有听雨的心情。 
 

**如果运气不行，那就试试勇气**，勇气也是保持清澈的一大基础条件。罗曼·罗兰的一句话鼓舞了无数被浑浊所困扰的人们，“世上只有一种英雄，就是在认清残酷真相之后依然热爱生活。”当幻想和现实面对时，总是很痛苦的。要么你被痛苦击倒，要么你把痛苦踩在脚下。敢于向黑暗宣战的人，心里必须充满光明。 
 

在潦草的人生里，我们要坚持自己清澈的灵魂，尽可能的结识一些有良知、有有趣灵魂的人，然后就能渐渐找到我们想要的美好生活。

✨今天分享的是模拟经营类游戏，感兴趣的朋友就接着看下去吧～

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dVMsoG3ubVHHbHPQ8OUgv.png?height=597&width=1080)

**模拟经营游戏是模拟游戏的一种。由玩家扮演管理者的角色，对游戏中虚拟的现实世界进行经营管理。**可以是城市，可以是国家，可以是世界，可以是公司，也可以是其他团体。虚拟经营游戏一般模拟现实社会的模式，人物的想法等都是根据规则随机定制的。许多模拟经营游戏以“大亨(Tycoon)”一词作为结尾。常见游戏的目标是彻底控制游戏中可操作的所有资源，实现垄断；或者发展到一定程度（例如足够科技水平带领市民脱离地球等）。

**其实无论游戏外表如何包装，模拟经营的本质体验以及核心都是以成长和发展——从小到大，由少变多的一个过程**。并且是在有一个可供玩家发展的载体为根本。并且游戏的发展不是完全自由的，而是在既定的规则之下进行，玩家利用游戏既定的规则进行决策，选择自己认为最快速的方式进行发展。

### Crypto Unicorns（内测中）

🪙Token名称｜RBW、UNIM

🔗支持的区块链｜Polygon

🖥支持的客户端｜网页端

Crypto Unicorns官网：https://www.cryptounicorns.fun

Crypto Unicorns推特：https://twitter.com/crypto_unicorns

Discord官方社区：https://discord.gg/cryptounicorns

**🦄️Crypto Unicorns** 的主要游戏玩法是农场模拟经营。玩家购买土地NFT，他们可以随着时间的推移进行升级。土地是游戏社区经济的引擎，是独角兽培育、孵化和进化的地方。

玩家的农场是他们在 Unicorn Multiverse 中的“牧场之家”。这是一块完全可定制的土地，拥有各种生产性建筑，包括马厩、苗圃、车间、收集车和农场地块。玩家可以从升级他们的土地中受益，从而增加其生产力。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GBY0KRgin_yGYgvU6pjHG.png?height=607&width=1080)

**团队背景**

Laguna Games 是一个世界顶级的游戏开发工作室，由来自世界各地的 57 位行业资深人士组成，大多来自游戏行业并且有着 10 年以上的行业经验，曾参与过变形金刚、现代战争、漫威英雄、星球大战、街头霸王、怪物猎人等知名大型游戏。Laguna Games 热衷于为玩家社区带来每天的欢乐时刻，并希望玩家能有高质量的娱乐。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/0MpNjM7uXpmKqp-m_xOrl.png?height=246&width=1080)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/izxrOPaefuziOQWODaP9c.png?height=608&width=1080)

**融资信息**

Laguna Games 得到了 BITKRAFT、Polygon Studios 等投资者的支持，相信他们建立社区拥有的游戏体验的使命和愿景。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/T_G-vKD5vabN2aOz_uE5-.png?height=104&width=2160)

同时 Laguna Games与多个“PlayerDAO”（游戏公会）合作，将会与区块链游戏领域的主要参与者建立长期关系。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/LK-gcayT20IsK5zJ_0FqN.png?height=174&width=2160)

**🦄️点击即可标题查看往期整理的 Crypto Unicorns 教程文章：**

### Sunflower Land（已上线）

🪙Token名称｜SFL

🔗支持的区块链｜Polygon 

🖥支持的客户端｜网页端

Sunflower Land官网：https://sunflower-land.com/

Sunflower Land推特：https://twitter.com/0xSunflowerLand

Discord官方社区：http://discord.gg/sunflowerland

**Sunflower Land** 是一款基于 Polygon（原MATIC）的农业采集类链游，玩家可以在游戏中耕种、砍伐、采矿、捕鱼、制作等等。收获、收集或制作的每件物品都可以在 Polygon  区块链上识别为NFT并被玩家拥有。游戏通过内置机制反映现实生活中的经济供求关系，随着时间的推移，资源将变得越来越稀缺。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UoP_Ad3Ev2NQM0ffk56s_.png?height=540&width=960)

**团队信息**

Sunflower Land 由一群热爱构建社区驱动项目的热情人士打造。由全球 20 多名工程师和 30 多名设计师建造。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MGkV7rGO9T2L1NWqabQVu.png?height=483&width=1080)

进入游戏的时候需要捐赠 $10MATIC  ，可以拥有 1块NFT 土地。

另外：您收获、收集或制作的每件物品都可以在 Polygon 区块链上识别为 NFT 并被玩家拥有拥有。这使人们能够收集有价值的特殊资源，然后与朋友分享或将它们列在 OpenSea 等受支持的交易平台上。

### Town Star（已上线）

🪙Token名称｜$TOWN

🔗支持的区块链｜Gala Games

🖥支持的客户端｜网页端

Twon Star官网：https://app.gala.games/games/town-star

GalaGames推特：https://twitter.com/GoGalaGames

Discord官方社区：https://discord.com/invite/JtnCNMFnnK

🌟**Town Star** 是 GalaGames 上首个具有 play to earn（P2E）模式的一款竞技性农场经营模拟游戏，玩家可以选择自己的农场位置，在土地上种植庄稼、收集资源、建造工厂来不断提升经济水平，卖出产品。

Town Star 会在赛季结束后，根据玩家的排名给予奖励。排名前 500 可以获得 75-10000 美金的奖励。游戏过程中会有当前赛季的每日挑战任务，在规定时间内收集指定数量的“星星”，赚取方式为在游戏内售卖商品，次数越多、商品价值越贵、获得“星星”奖励越多。完成挑战后，会给予代币奖励。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bXBE7hm7rPb5SvWeBGNNh.png?height=608&width=1080)

**创始团队**

#### CEO：Eric Schiermeyer

连续创业者。社交游戏公司、美股上市企业 Zynga 的联合创始人，开发并运营 FarmVille、Mafia Wars、Cafe World 等众多游戏，同时是社交类媒体网站 Myspace 的联合创始人兼 CTO，以及游戏公司 Bee Cave Games 的投资者和顾问。

#### CMO：Jason Brink

2014 年进入加密领域，在加密社区中以绰号「Bitbender」闻名，曾担任多个加密项目的技术文档工程师和营销顾问，包括 Experience Points、Verge 和 Reddcoin 等。同时是一位学术顾问，曾创立加拿大学术咨询公司 Plato Coaching 和区块链咨询公司 Rubric Partners。

#### 工作室总监：Michael McCarthy

在游戏行业有 20 年的工作经验，曾在 Troika Games、Massive Black、Sandbox Games、Zynga 等多家游戏公司工作，曾创立游戏动画制作公司 Applied Cinematics。

**合作伙伴**

**Brave：**由 JavaScript 发明者、火狐浏览器创始人 Brendan Eich 创立的隐私浏览器产品，用户使用该浏览器可从广告中收获 BAT 代币奖励，目前有 200 万月活用户。Gala Games 将 Brave 作为推荐的区块链游戏浏览器，并集成 BAT 代币作为平台内的推荐支付手段之一，双方合作举办了游戏比赛以及发行了限量版 NFT。

**Flare Networks：**集成以太坊 EVM 的智能合约平台，致力于为 XRP、LTC 等区块链引入智能合约。Gala Games 平台内的 NFT 资产将可以在 Flare 上铸造和交易，同时 Gala 节点网络将为 Flare 时间序列预言机（FTSO）提供数据支持，节点可以从中获得 FLR 代币奖励。

**Mazer Games：**电竞俱乐部，旗下有使命召唤、堡垒之夜等多个游戏的电竞战队，其获得了 Gala Games 的赞助。

**Polygon（原 Matic）：**以太坊 Layer 2 网络，Gala Games 将与其合作解决游戏内的 Gas 问题，并合作发行一款新游戏。

**BNB Chain：**Gala Games 从 BNB Chain 的 1 亿美元加速器基金中获得了资金支持。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qa2MvQvBeb7mnf9OAolMB.png?height=422&width=1080)

**ChromaWay**

ChromaWay 是真正的区块链先驱。早在 2012 年，ChromaWay 的 CTO 就创建了世界上第一个发行用户生成令牌的源代码。他的“彩色硬币”项目 2012-2014 启发了许多项目，并为我们行业中的许多人提供了教育。参与该项目的人包括 Decentraland 的 Esteban Ordano 和以太坊的 Vitalik Buterin。ChromaWay 在 2014 年从区块链上的第一个彩色硬币协议应用程序（例如 LHV 银行的稳定币）转向为企业和政府做创新的新技术，最终导致了 Chromia。几个已知的案例已经在土地登记中，从 2016 年瑞典国家到 2020 年在南美洲的美洲开发银行。现在，与我的邻居爱丽丝一起，他们从真实的土地迈出了想象的土地。

**Plato Farm** 是一款以农场为主题的元宇宙生态项目，生态模型复刻了早期风靡一时的《QQ 农场》游戏，并且在整体的农场机制上更加复杂。Plato Farm 生态本身包含了种植和养殖这两种基础生产经济模型，以此为基础还包含了一个加工厂经济，加工厂除了能够加工畜牧养殖所需的必需品如饲料外，还能够加工果酱、面包等原材料加工成品，整体构成了一个供需关系较强的经济模型，PLATO 本身也是生态内的治理通证，持有该通证将能够参与生态内的投票，并且也能够享有权益。

合作的钱包有 Huobi wallet, Coin98 wallet, BitKeep wallet, OnTo wallet and Coinhub wallet, TokenSoft, OKC, Safepal 等。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/sBpAy3-51v45AQRKhLq8e.png?height=1023&width=1080)

### 总结

🎮**模拟经营游戏向玩家提供了一种“欣欣向荣”的成长性娱乐体验，通过不断的正向反馈最终让玩家所经营的主体发展壮大，最后形成“成长感”**。这种反馈首先会体现在数值上，其次是主体的外观不断壮大。玩家通过动用自己的智慧形成策略来加快主体的成长，在解决难题获得成就感的过程中实现最终目标。

回到链游这方面，**模拟经营游戏不仅有上述优点，并且投资门槛分化，可以很低也可以很高，操作门槛很低，破圈容易**。但这并不一定只是优点，在模拟经营链游中，马太效应会更强，投入多的人获得更多回报，很可能一不小心就变成了庞氏经济。相比于其他链游，模拟经营链游几乎不存在任何 PVE 元素，差不多完全是个单机游戏。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dVMsoG3ubVHHbHPQ8OUgv.png?height=597&width=1080)

**模拟经营游戏是模拟游戏的一种。由玩家扮演管理者的角色，对游戏中虚拟的现实世界进行经营管理。**可以是城市，可以是国家，可以是世界，可以是公司，也可以是其他团体。虚拟经营游戏一般模拟现实社会的模式，人物的想法等都是根据规则随机定制的。许多模拟经营游戏以“大亨(Tycoon)”一词作为结尾。常见游戏的目标是彻底控制游戏中可操作的所有资源，实现垄断；或者发展到一定程度（例如足够科技水平带领市民脱离地球等）。

**其实无论游戏外表如何包装，模拟经营的本质体验以及核心都是以成长和发展——从小到大，由少变多的一个过程**。并且是在有一个可供玩家发展的载体为根本。并且游戏的发展不是完全自由的，而是在既定的规则之下进行，玩家利用游戏既定的规则进行决策，选择自己认为最快速的方式进行发展。

玩家的农场是他们在 Unicorn Multiverse 中的“牧场之家”。这是一块完全可定制的土地，拥有各种生产性建筑，包括马厩、苗圃、车间、收集车和农场地块。玩家可以从升级他们的土地中受益，从而增加其生产力。

CropBytes 团队于 2021年11月 完成了他们的 260 万融资，融资方包括全球知名风投和行业领袖 Draper Dragon、Old Fashion Research、Exnetwork Capital、Kryptos Research、AVStar Capital、AU21 Capital、Master Ventures、EPNS、Strip Finance 等。此外，还有天使投资人和顾问，如 WazirX 的首席运营官 Siddharth Menon、Polygon 的首席运营官 Sandeep Nailwal、ExNetwork Capital 的创始人 Eric Su、EPNS 的创始人 Harsh Rajat、Solana 的增长负责人Tamar Menteshashvili。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/45UibVIjKj32pMc3eCzkH.png?height=744&width=1080)

### Plato Farm（已上线）

🪙Token名称｜$MARK、$GMARK、$PLATO

🔗支持的区块链｜BSC

🖥支持的客户端｜网页端

Plato Farm官网：https://www.platofarm.game/

Plato Farm推特：https://mobile.twitter.com/plato_farm

Discord官方社区：https://discord.com/invite/ZXkeQBZVTS

Telegram官方社区：https://t.me/platofarm

**Plato Farm** 是一款以农场为主题的元宇宙生态项目，生态模型复刻了早期风靡一时的《QQ 农场》游戏，并且在整体的农场机制上更加复杂。Plato Farm 生态本身包含了种植和养殖这两种基础生产经济模型，以此为基础还包含了一个加工厂经济，加工厂除了能够加工畜牧养殖所需的必需品如饲料外，还能够加工果酱、面包等原材料加工成品，整体构成了一个供需关系较强的经济模型，PLATO 本身也是生态内的治理通证，持有该通证将能够参与生态内的投票，并且也能够享有权益。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xjYM2PGQkmICCQDnZ16pA.png?height=359&width=1080)

 **团队信息**

Plato Farm 项目由 Second Space Studio 开发并于 2018 年上线，项目核心成员开发运营过种类繁多的大型网络游戏，来自侏罗纪世界进化等世界知名游戏团队和区块链开发商。Plato Farm 在北美市场取得了巨大成功，吸引了 200 万用户和超过 20 万的 DAU。该游戏将区块链的底层合约技术架构与完全嵌入的游戏内用户相结合，这些用户可以在其科学交易系统中通过边玩边赚钱来茁壮成长。

**投资机构**

Plato Farm迄今已经获得来自多家全球知名风投机构的投资，包括 Chronos Ventures, BlockVenture, Huobi Ventures, Formless, OKEx Blockdream Ventures, OP Crypto, Web4 Ventures, Cipholio Ventures, ZBS Capital, Chain Broker, CryptoDep, Vadym Piholenko, Gagarin Crypto, Gcrypto Media, Top 7 ICO, Block Patch, Incrypted, Bitwired, Magic Enterprises, CryptoPhd, Crypto Daku, Bitwired, Ethos vertical, Block Talks 等。

合作的钱包有 Huobi wallet, Coin98 wallet, BitKeep wallet, OnTo wallet and Coinhub wallet, TokenSoft, OKC, Safepal 等。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/sBpAy3-51v45AQRKhLq8e.png?height=1023&width=1080)

### 总结

🎮**模拟经营游戏向玩家提供了一种“欣欣向荣”的成长性娱乐体验，通过不断的正向反馈最终让玩家所经营的主体发展壮大，最后形成“成长感”**。这种反馈首先会体现在数值上，其次是主体的外观不断壮大。玩家通过动用自己的智慧形成策略来加快主体的成长，在解决难题获得成就感的过程中实现最终目标。

回到链游这方面，**模拟经营游戏不仅有上述优点，并且投资门槛分化，可以很低也可以很高，操作门槛很低，破圈容易**。但这并不一定只是优点，在模拟经营链游中，马太效应会更强，投入多的人获得更多回报，很可能一不小心就变成了庞氏经济。相比于其他链游，模拟经营链游几乎不存在任何 PVE 元素，差不多完全是个单机游戏。

title: How to create mail3
body:
First what is mail3 : Mail3 is decentralized email

1. What are the advantages of mail3:

* You don't need to create a password here
* You can separate your important emails and emails about your web3 journey here
  I think it's important for those of you who like to fill out forms and give your email. and it just satisfies the content of your email.. make it easy for you to view and sort emails about your web3 journey here.. so that your main email is not filled with spam or unimportant emails

All you need to use mail3 is ENS.. Why is that?Because the mail3 team does not have enough resources and overcomes sybil attacks

* Go TO : [https://app.mail3.me](https://app.mail3.me/)

* Confirm Signture

title: 一个人累了，想要放弃的时候，要好好想想这3句话，有道理吗
body:
记得有句话说，“人”生下来，活下去！人生哪有那么多一帆风顺，生活就像过山车，有高峰也有

1、时间从来不会偏袒任何人，你的时间在哪人生的花就开在哪。时间对每个人都是公平的，但相同的时间里，人和人之间却有不同的差距，拉开这些差距的不是时间，而是你对时间的态度，你浪费时间，时间就会忽略你，你珍惜时间，时间也会正视你，善于利用时间的人，能珍惜每一分每一秒去奋斗。时间是这个世上最为公平的东西，也是最耗费不起的东西。你的时间花在哪里，你的人生的花就会开在哪里。

成功的道路是曲折的也是坎坷的，期间有痛苦也有幸福，你必须要熬过漫长的低谷期，不要因为没有看到想要的成绩就选择放弃，觉得努力再也没有用，其实是因为你没有坚持到底，坚持不是三分钟的热度，可能需要你付出很长的时间，甚至要年复一年地去做同一件事，才能得到你想要的突破和成长，才能看到坚持的意义。

2、路不好走那是因为你在走上坡路。我们每个人在生活中总有很多时刻，人们遇到困难总是希望能既不费心，又不费力，就能轻松处理好，但现实却哪有那么多得一帆风顺，当你觉得走的很难很累时，千万不要放弃，因为你可能正走上坡路上。人生的路就像是爬山，每一步都需要勇气，每一步都是挑战，相信自己，会有更好的风景在后面，坚持下去，每多走一步就会看到更美的风景。

3、再长的路，一步步总能走完，再短的路，不迈开双脚永远也到不了。人生是一条漫长的道路，但再长的路，都是一步步走出来的，当你觉得很难坚持走下去时，千万不要泄气，对自己严格一点，不要轻易给自己找借口，虽然坚持下去很难，你会觉得很辛苦。但是请你相信，正是那些艰难的坚持和付出，才能成就那个不断变得更好的自己。

title: SpruceID早期交互教程，融资4000万美元交互较复杂
body:
**创作不易希望多多转推点赞便是对我的鼓励与支持，家人们不要迷路，本人推特有更多输出实用价值内容绝对不要错过：**

[https://twitter.com/maik2hello](https://twitter.com/maik2hello)

SpruceD 由顶级加密风投公司A16Z牵头先后完成两轮融资近4000万美元，为用户可移植声誉所需的身份验证、凭证和存储提供支持，提供对数据的分散访问控制以及 Web2 API 和 Web3 之间的互操作性以及用于身份识别的尖端隐私和可用性技术，简单的说属于DID身份认证基础构架系统，未来在Web3中不可或缺的底层身份识别系统框架，不仅提供身份认证识别同时为底层存储提供支持。

**像这种做基础构架系统的项目，得到顶级风投青睐的大笔融资，即使你不懂得项目本身的发展前景，也应该引起足够的重视，但凡能参与的机会尽量不要错过，其他的不多说，要是有兴趣的可以自己找资料研究一下，在这里不再对项目本身做过多的阐述。其本身的交互过程稍微比较繁复，复杂一点。我们下面对其整个绑定交互过程做详细操作说明。其复杂的操作过程会挡住一些人，这便是机会。**

首先通过chrom下载扩展程序应用钱包“Temple-Tezos wallet”,下载钱包扩展应用不要嫌麻烦，很简单几分钟就搞定钱包，没用过也不要紧，以后大概率能用到此钱包，未雨绸缪总是好事

[https://chrome.google.com/webstore/category/extensions?hl=zh-CN](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/category/extensions?hl=zh-CN)

然后进入如下网址开始绑定交互：

[https://tzprofiles.com/connect](https://tzprofiles.com/connect)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3Ntd6YopBGxdzTVreVtJY.png?height=577&width=1182)

**第一项资料绑定认证**：像如下方式填写即可，注意;网址链接填写自己的推特地址就可以，图片地址填写推特资料图片地址就可以,然后点击“submit”提交完成第一项

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8EKLoaays2qCKHUAta30C.png?height=600&width=1183)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fMwiiTGX0VqDd_qOVPZS0.png?height=492&width=604)

**第二项推特认证**：第1步填写推特用户名去掉@，第2步点击确认签名钱包批准签署，第3步转推，第4步复制转推链接张贴最后，完成。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oq7gEjolXlFDRryiycW-2.png?height=611&width=1201)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oUYP4EhY7xU7E9vAbd7RF.png?height=608&width=1043)

**第三项绑定ETH钱包**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/b9U7OUO0Qzm0q072SvsrD.png?height=586&width=1176)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3MdTjrwiNyUdgcDRshnaq.png?height=584&width=1151)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/lICI_dwmXV8yAaNNPokUQ.png?height=608&width=1152)

第四项discord绑定认证：需要进入官方discord指定频道输入签署文件证明

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KeKF_nbNz4azAgD7tAg7c.png?height=595&width=1189)

通过1，2步完成discord绑定

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7ej5pehr2wDyC6_1lbXPq.png?height=618&width=1035)

然后通过3步，复制签署文件证明，点击第4步“here”进入官方discord“#verification”频道提交刚才复制的信息张贴频道中，完成。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/HeFlaxDXD0dAsjdbHbMSY.png?height=599&width=1127)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WVPQvI-pjkgN7AzDQsFQU.png?height=546&width=962)

然后点击鼠标右键复制你发出的消息链接地址张贴到页面最后，完成不和谐认证。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/AMby_v3sxNi9JFQkdT3f1.png?height=541&width=965)

由于第五项认证比较麻烦，需要一个网站域名，我们最后再来讲解如何认证，大概会花费大概13块钱人民币。（涉及钱财请自己考虑是否能承受损失，自负盈亏不是投资建）

**第六项github认证：**

如果没有账号申请一个也很简单，这里不再赘述，刚申请的新号不要急于用来认证容易被ban完成不了任务。

前面几步和上面的认证方式一样，我们直接进入关键几步：复制第1步文字，然后点击第2步 “creat new gist”，进入github页面，张贴刚刚复制的文字，点击右下角创建完成，创建完成后复制这个新的github页面地址张贴到第六项认证页面，完成认证。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NQNfcOeU-6xCQBPF2I3RU.png?height=606&width=1188)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/vY08cslEWKmbrMRAnx4nt.png?height=576&width=1344)

第五项网站域名绑定认证：如果没有域名，需要购买一个域名（传统网站域名不是ENS），随便输入英文字符购买最便宜的大概13元人民币左右，**注意一定看清购买时间，选购买一年支付的，有些写的便宜价格是包两年，第一年便宜，第二年贵，有误导看清楚**

[https://www.godaddy.com/zh-sg](https://www.godaddy.com/zh-sg)

如果网站文字是英文，拉到页面最后调到新加坡和CNY即可

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_YNUnShjTepPeohkqgcm4.png?height=615&width=1337)

在搜索栏中随便输入一串英文找寻便宜的域名，加入购物车进入支付页面，选定时间年限，确定金额点击支付

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_1NLCsgd8N-_oVxRy23xL.png?height=590&width=1333)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/i5C4Dku6u8MBHiDrW6k78.png?height=569&width=1341)

进入支付页面后需要简单编辑自己的地址，不用详细写顺便乱写都行，如果写的国内的地址被卡不能支付，一般不会，就填写国外的地址即可，扫码完成支付即可。一定要填写正确的邮箱地址，到时候会通过邮箱发送给你域名。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DXAUP9cD9TMYGUU26q2rM.png?height=604&width=1285)

域名完成邮箱接收，一会儿点击“管理域名”进入自己购买的域名，填写需要认证的资料

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/83w32KA_Ka1HkGEwi1zNT.png?height=526&width=1265)

第五项域名资料认证：前面的录入和上面的认证一样，输入自己的域名，钱包签署批准，得到一串字符，**复制这串字符后面要用**，然后通过邮箱进入自己的域名，下拉页面找到“DNS”点开

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hGCRlzGgohB-93Q4TEXyC.png?height=612&width=1170)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/e3N7dov2vcJ51oWITypC_.png?height=613&width=1312)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1N64zOvkSPvsyZ-_sH6_k.png?height=590&width=1363)

**如下图选择方式设置即可**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dlSjnNsE7LUs04t4IJWY3.png?height=594&width=1269)

**红框处输入刚复制的一串字符信息，点击下面的添加记录，这个更新信息可能慢点，稍等一会儿。**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hCaD2ECHIBeJdR30F_T0P.png?height=529&width=1247)

等上面完成之后回到认证资料页面，完成最后两步，最后一步确认信息这块儿，一般会比较慢，少则几个小时，多则1，2天，有的几分钟就确认了，只有等待，完成所有的认证后，还需要钱包继续认证不要忘了，**钱包需要有一点点XTZ代币1个就够了1刀左右最后会花费大概0.5个左右，可以从币安或者okx转到XTZ钱包。OKX交易所代币可以买1个的数量，直接通过链上转账就可以了。**

**最后还要强调一下，这一套认证需要一次性认证完才行，否则需要重新全部认证。**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/IuaWKQxxTJ83x8wwJrtUb.png?height=542&width=1142)

完成所有的认证后可以在链上看到确认信息

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1Z9Wix1YQYnVTVM2hlrH9.png?height=608&width=1357)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZFOSwXjYSkH7OnTe_OOk0.png?height=606&width=664)

通过复制自己的地址进入搜索，可以看到自己的认证已经完成。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/h2rrZIH8Bp-8V_kW8u-wu.png?height=565&width=1186)
